1a1('bum): (pa) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2('bum): (黃) 大般若經第十三部
1b1('bum): @##/ /shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig pa/
1b2('bum): phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha
1b3('bum): rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan
1b4('bum): pa la snying por myi lta 'am/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
1b5('bum): po de/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad
1b6('bum): pas myi 'gro 'am/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/
1b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang
1b8('bum): bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems
2a1('bum): bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/
2a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
2a3('bum): bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes
2a4('bum): yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur
2a5('bum): la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/
2a6('bum): klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha
2a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
2a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi gyur la/ zhum par myi 'gyur/
2b1('bum): yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir myi ldog la/ thos nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /
2b2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing /
2b3('bum): zhum par myi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/
2b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
2b5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtag par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
2b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
2b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2b8('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
3a1('bum): rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor skye ba myed pa
3a2('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor 'gag pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
3a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
3a5('bum): 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la
3a6('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
3a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
3a8('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
3b1('bum): rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rmyi lam la gzhol
3b2('bum): ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
3b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
3b4('bum): 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smyig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i
3b5('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
3b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
3b8('bum): par 'gyur/ smon pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha'
4a1('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam
4a2('bum): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
4a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
4a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
4a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
4a6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam
4a7('bum): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
4a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
4b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmyi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4b2('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
4b3('bum): sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smyig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
4b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
4b6('bum): mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la
4b7('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ myig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/
4b8('bum): sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa
5a1('bum): lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog
5a2('bum): pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes
5a3('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus
5a4('bum): te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ myig gi
5a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags
5a6('bum): sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog
5a7('bum): pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ mye'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/
5a8('bum): nam mkha'i khams pa rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la
5b1('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ mying dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags
5b2('bum): sam/ len pa la rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog
5b3('bum): pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
5b4('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/
5b5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/
5b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
5b7('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
5b8('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
6a1('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
6a2('bum): sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la
6a3('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/
6a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad myed pa rnams pa rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
6a5('bum): rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
6a6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi
6a7('bum): sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa
6a8('bum): lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes
6b1('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyis la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
6b2('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba la rtog pa ma yon no/ /'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du byed la rtog pa
6b3('bum): ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /myig la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus la rtog pa ma
6b4('bum): yin no/ /yid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sgra la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dri la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ro la rtog pa ma yin no/ /reg la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chos la
6b5('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa la
6b6('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la
6b7('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa
6b8('bum): ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa
7a1('bum): ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
7a2('bum): ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mye'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams
7a3('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mying dang gzugs
7a4('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no/ /reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /len pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /srid pa la
7a5('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
7a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha
7a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
7a8('bum): rtog pa ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas stong
7b1('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog
7b2('bum): pa ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /myi dmyigs pa
7b3('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
7b4('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
7b5('bum): stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
7b6('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshad myed pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
7b7('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
7b8('bum): smon pa myed pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs
8a1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
8a2('bum): snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
8a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang
8a4('bum): ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / phyogs na yang myi gnas/ yul na yang myi gnas/ gang na yang myi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs myi dmyigs so/ /'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang myi dmyigs so/ /gang la
8a5('bum): grangs myi dmyigs shing / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba myi dmyigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /tshor bas ma yin no/ /'du shes kyis ma yin no/ /'du byed
8a6('bum): kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /myig gis ma yin no/ /rna bas ma yin no/ /snas ma yin no/ /lces ma yin no/ /lus kyis ma yin no/ /yid kyis ma yin no/ /gzugs kyis ma
8a7('bum): yin no/ /sgras ma yin no/ /dris ma yin no/ /ros ma yin no/ /reg gis ma yin no/ /chos kyis ma yin no/ /myig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /
8a8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pas ma
8b1('bum): yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ /myig gi
8b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma
8b3('bum): yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /chu'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /mye'i khams
8b4('bum): kyis ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams kyis ma yin no/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no/ /ma rig pas ma yin no/ /'du byed kyis ma yin no/ /rnam
8b5('bum): par shes pas ma yin no/ /mying dang gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /skye mched drug gis ma yin no/ /reg pas ma yin no/ /tshor bas ma yin no/ /sred pas ma yin no/ /len pas ma yin no/ /
8b6('bum): srid pas ma yin no/ /skye bas ma yin no/ /rga shis ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma
8b7('bum): yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa
8b8('bum): nyid kyis ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /
9a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis
9a2('bum): ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos po
9a3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
9a4('bum): kyis ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no/ /stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yin no/ /'phags
9a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /gzugs myed pa'i
9a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
9a7('bum): mtshan ma myed dang / smon pa myed pas ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma yin no/ /de bzhin
9a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /byams pa chen pos ma yin no/ /snying rje chen pos ma yin no/ /
9b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin
9b2('bum): no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rang byang chub kyis ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
9b3('bum): gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
9b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna nyid kyang rnam
9b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /gzugs nyid
9b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sgra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dri nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /ro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /reg nyid
9b7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /chos nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
9b8('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus kyi
10a1('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
10a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa
10a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
10a4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa
10a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /
10a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
10a7('bum): do/ /mye'i khams nyid kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /
10a8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam par
10b1('bum): shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mying dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /reg pa
10b2('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
10b3('bum): pa nyid do/ /srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rga shi nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
10b4('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
10b5('bum): nyid do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
10b6('bum): tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid
10b7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa
10b8('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mtha'
11a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
11a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid
11a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /
11a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
11a5('bum): pa nyid do/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /
11a6('bum): stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /
11a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshad myed pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /gzugs
11a8('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa
11b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa
11b2('bum): thams cad nyid do/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang
11b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /byams pa chen po nyid
11b4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
11b5('bum): rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
11b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
11b7('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
11b8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
12a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid
12a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
12a3('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
12a4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
12a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
12a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
12a7('bum): gcig pa'o/ /reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
12a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
12b1('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes
12b2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
12b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
12b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus
12b5('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
12b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
12b7('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lus kyi
12b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
13a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
13a2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
13a3('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
13a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
13a5('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de
13a6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
13a7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
13a8('bum): pa'o/ /mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
13b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
13b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
13b3('bum): gcig pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
13b4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
13b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
13b6('bum): skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
13b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
13b8('bum): pa'o/ /sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
14a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
14a2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
14a3('bum): rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
14a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
14a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
14a6('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
14a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
14a8('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
14b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
14b2('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa
14b3('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
14b4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
14b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
14b6('bum): nyid gcig pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
14b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
14b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
15a1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
15a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
15a3('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
15a4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de
15a5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
15a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
15a7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
15a8('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
15b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
15b2('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
15b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
15b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
15b5('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
15b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
15b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
15b8('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
16a1('bum): dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
16a2('bum): mtshan pa myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /mngon par
16a3('bum): shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
16a4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
16a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
16a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
16a7('bum): nyid gcig pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /byams
16a8('bum): pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
16b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
16b2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum bcu brgyad do// //
16b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha
16b4('bum): rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das
16b5('bum): gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i
16b6('bum): lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha
16b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
16b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
17a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig nyid rnam
17a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig go/ /rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna nyid rnam pa thams
17a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
17a4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
17a5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
17a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
17a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ /chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
17a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /
17b1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
17b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes
17b3('bum): pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
17b4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg
17b5('bum): pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
17b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid
17b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
17b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
18a1('bum): pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus
18a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
18a3('bum): ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te
18a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
18a5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /mye'i khams nyid
18a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams
18a7('bum): so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
18a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed nyid rnam
18b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /
18b2('bum): mying dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
18b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
18b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
18b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
18b6('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
18b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
18b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
19a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam
19a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
19a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
19a4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam
19a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /
19a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
19a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las
19a8('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
19b1('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
19b2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
19b3('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi
19b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
19b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /
19b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
19b7('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par
19b8('bum): spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
20a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa
20a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
20a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /
20a4('bum): bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
20a5('bum): tshad myed pa rnams so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par
20a6('bum): thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
20a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid rnam pa thams
20a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /mngon pa shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
20b1('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid
20b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs
20b3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams so/ /myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
20b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid rnam
20b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas
20b6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
20b7('bum): myed do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du shes
20b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang
21a1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par
21a2('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi de bzhin
21a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
21a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
21a5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
21a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
21a7('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
21a8('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
21b1('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
21b2('bum): byar myed do/ /dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ro'i de
21b3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
21b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
21b5('bum): chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi rnam
21b6('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par
21b7('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de
21b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
22a1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
22a2('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
22a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
22a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
22a5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
22a6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
22a7('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
22a8('bum): ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
22b1('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
22b2('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
22b3('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
22b4('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
22b5('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
22b6('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
22b7('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
22b8('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
23a1('bum): byar myed do/ /mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
23a2('bum): byar myed do/ /rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /nam mkha'i
23a3('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
23a4('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
23a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
23a6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
23a7('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
23a8('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
23b1('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshor ba'i
23b2('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
23b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
23b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
23b5('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
23b6('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
23b7('bum): myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
23b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
24a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
24a2('bum): su byar myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
24a3('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
24a4('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
24a5('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su
24a6('bum): byar myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyi
24a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong
24a8('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /chen po stong pa
24b1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
24b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa kyi de bzhin nyid gang
24b3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
24b4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
24b5('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
24b6('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
24b7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
24b8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
25a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
25a2('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
25a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
25a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
25a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
25a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
25a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
25a8('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin
25b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
25b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
25b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
25b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
