25b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
25b6('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin
25b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams
25b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
26a1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
26a2('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
26a3('bum): gnyis su byar myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
26a4('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
26a5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
26a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
26a7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
26a8('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
26b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
26b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
26b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
26b4('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
26b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
26b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
26b7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
26b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
27a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
27a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
27a3('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
27a4('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
27a5('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
27a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
27a7('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
27a8('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
27b1('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
27b2('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
27b3('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing
27b4('bum): brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o/ /de nas
27b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag
27b6('bum): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
27b7('bum): pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
27b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
28a1('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig go/ /rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
28a2('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
28a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
28a4('bum): nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o/ /
28a5('bum): ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ /chos nyid rnam pa thams cad
28a6('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /
28a7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
28a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus
28b1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
28b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
28b3('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i
28b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
28b5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
28b6('bum): pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg
28b7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa
28b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
29a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
29a2('bum): pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
29a3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
29a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /mye'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
29a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i
29a6('bum): khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
29a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
29a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams
29b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
29b2('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
29b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
29b4('bum): pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
29b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
29b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
29b7('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
29b8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa
30a1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa
30a2('bum): nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
30a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa
30a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus
30a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
30a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
30a7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
30a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad
30b1('bum): stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
30b2('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /
30b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
30b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag
30b5('bum): par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
30b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid
30b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
30b8('bum): nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
31a1('bum): pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan nyid rnam pa
31a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad myed
31a3('bum): pa rnams so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam
31a4('bum): par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
31a5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa myed pa dang / smon pa
31a6('bum): myed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa nyid
31a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
31a8('bum): kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa
31b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
31b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
31b3('bum): so/ /byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
31b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
31b5('bum): pa rnams so/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
31b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
31b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
31b8('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
32a1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
32a2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
32a3('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
32a4('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
32a5('bum): lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
32a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
32a7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
32a8('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
32b1('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
32b2('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
32b3('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
32b4('bum): myed do/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig
32b5('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i
32b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
32b7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
32b8('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
33a1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
33a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi 'dus
33a3('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin
33a4('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
33a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
33a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
33a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
33a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
33b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
33b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
33b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
33b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
33b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
33b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
33b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
33b8('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
34a1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
34a2('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
34a3('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
34a4('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
34a5('bum): myed do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i de
34a6('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
34a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
34a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
34b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
34b2('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
34b3('bum): su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed
34b4('bum): do/ /srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /skye ba'i de bzhin nyid
34b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
34b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
34b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
34b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
35a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
35a2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi
35a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
35a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
35a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyi stong pa
35a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
35a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
35a8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de
35b1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
35b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
35b3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
35b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
35b5('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
35b6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
35b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
35b8('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
36a1('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
36a2('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
36a3('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
36a4('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed
36a5('bum): do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
36a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
36a7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rdzu
36a8('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dbang
36b1('bum): po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin
36b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin
36b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de
36b4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin
36b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
36b6('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
36b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
36b8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
37a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
37a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
37a3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /
37a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin
37a5('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi
37a6('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
37a7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa
37a8('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /so so yang
37b1('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /byams
37b2('bum): pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang
37b3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
37b4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
37b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
37b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
37b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
37b8('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
38a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
38a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
38a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
38a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
38a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
38a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
38a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
38a8('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
38b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te/
38b2('bum): chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu myed
38b3('bum): la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mos mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/
38b4('bum): nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba myed pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
38b5('bum): lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag bsam
38b6('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
38b7('bum): bu dag myi skye myi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / mngon par
38b8('bum): rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag
39a1('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag srog zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
39a2('bum): lha'i bu dag gso' ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag skyes bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag gang zag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag shed can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
39a3('bum): zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag shed bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag byed pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag tshor ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag shes pa po
39a4('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag
39a5('bum): 'du shes zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag myig zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
39a6('bum): lha'i bu dag rna ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lce zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lus zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu
39a7('bum): dag yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sgra zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu
39a8('bum): dag ro zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag reg zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag chos zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag myig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos
39b1('bum): 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lce'i rnam par shes
39b2('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
39b3('bum): lha'i bu dag myig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i
39b4('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus
39b5('bum): te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
39b6('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos
39b7('bum): 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
39b8('bum): lha'i bu dag sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mye'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
40a1('bum): lha'i bu dag rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag nam mkha'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir
40a2('bum): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu
40a3('bum): dag mying dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab
40a4('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sred pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag len pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag srid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
40a5('bum): bo/ /lha'i bu dag skye ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
40a6('bum): bu dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
40a7('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
40a8('bum): lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag phyi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag
40b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'dus byas stong
40b2('bum): pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag
40b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
40b4('bum): lha'i bu dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
40b5('bum): bo/ /lha'i bu dag dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir
40b6('bum): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zab pa'i
40b7('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag dbang po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
40b8('bum): lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
41a1('bum): zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag tshad myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa zab pa'i phyir
41a2('bum): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
41a3('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir/ chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir
41a4('bum): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag myi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i
41a5('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag byams pa chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir
41a6('bum): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag phyir myi 'ong ba'i
41a7('bum): 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag dgra bcom pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rang byang chub zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
41a8('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis
41b1('bum): yid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshor ba
41b2('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'du shes gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags/ 'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
41b3('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags/ myig gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan
41b4('bum): pa ma lags/ rna ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags/ sna gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags/ lce gzung ba'i
41b5('bum): slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi
41b6('bum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sgra gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
41b7('bum): lags/ dri gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ ro gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ reg gzung ba'i slad
41b8('bum): du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ chos gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
42a1('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
42a2('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lce'i rnam pa shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
42a3('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
42a4('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
42a5('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
42a6('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
42a7('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
42a8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung
42b1('bum): ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du
42b2('bum): ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sa'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ chu'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad
42b3('bum): du bstan pa ma lags/ mye'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rlung gi khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
42b4('bum): nam mkha'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ ma rig
42b5('bum): pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad
42b6('bum): du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mying dang gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ skye mched drug gzung ba'i
42b7('bum): slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma
42b8('bum): lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sred pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ len pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
43a1('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ srid pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ skye ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung
43a2('bum): ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rga shi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad
43a3('bum): du bstan pa ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
43a4('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung
43a5('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ nang
43a6('bum): stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ phyi
43a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
43a8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
43b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mtha'
43b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
43b3('bum): lags/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
43b4('bum): lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i
43b5('bum): slad du bstan pa ma lags/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi
43b6('bum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma
43b7('bum): lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams gzung
43b8('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dbang po rnams
44a1('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ stobs rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
44a2('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden
44a3('bum): pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshad myed pa rnams
44a4('bum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
44a5('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du
44a6('bum): bstan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mngon par shes pa
44a7('bum): rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ gzung kyi sgo rnams gzung
44a8('bum): ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ myi 'jigs
44b1('bum): pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
44b2('bum): byams pa chen po gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ snying rje chen po gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sangs rgyas
44b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
44b4('bum): lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i
44b5('bum): slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rang byang chub gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du
44b6('bum): bstan pa ma lags/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/
44b7('bum): myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so/ /bdag ni gzugs can no/ /bdag ni tshor ba'o/ /bdag gis tshor bar bya'o/ /bdag gi
44b8('bum): 'du shes so/ /bdag ni 'du shes can no/ /bdag gi 'du byed do/ /bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o/ /bdag gi myig go/ /
45a1('bum): bdag gis blta bar bya'o/ /bdag gi rna ba'o/ /bdag gis thos par bya'o/ /bdag gi sna'o/ /bdag gis bsnam mo/ /bdag gi lce'o/ /bdag gis myong bar bya'o/ /bdag gi lus so/ /
45a2('bum): bdag gis reg par bya'o/ /bdag gi yid do/ /bdag ni yid can no/ /bdag gi gzugs so/ /bdag ni gzugs dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag gi sgra'o/ /bdag ni nyan pa'o/ /bdag gi dri'o/ /bdag
45a3('bum): ni snom pa'o/ /bdag gi ro'o/ /bdag ni ro myong ba'o/ /bdag gi reg go/ /bdag ni reg par byed pa'o/ /bdag gi chos so/ /bdag ni chos shes pa'o/ /bdag gi myig gi rnam par
45a4('bum): shes pa'o/ /bdag ni myig gi rnam par shes pa can no/ /bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa can no/ /bdag gi sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni
45a5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa can no/ /bdag gi lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes can no/ /bdag gi lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa can
45a6('bum): no/ /bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa can no/ /bdag gi myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bdag ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa can no/ /bdag gi rna ba'i
45a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa can no/ /bdag gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa can no/ /bdag gi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bdag ni lce'i
45a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa can no/ /bdag gi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa can no/ /bdag gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa can no/ /
45b1('bum): bdag gi myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bdag ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/ /bdag gi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg
45b2('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/ /bdag gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/ /bdag gi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /
45b3('bum): bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/ /bdag gi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/ /bdag gi yid kyi
45b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/ /bdag gi sa'i khams so/ /bdag ni sa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/ /
45b5('bum): bdag gi chu'i khams so/ /bdag ni chu'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag gi mye'i khams so/ /bdag ni mye'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag gi rlung gi khams
45b6('bum): so/ /bdag ni rlung gi khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag gi nam mkha'i khams so/ /bdag ni nam mkha'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag gi rnam
45b7('bum): par shes pa'i khams so/ /bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/ /bdag gi ma rig pa'o/ /bdag ni ma rig pa can no/ /bdag gi 'du byed do/ /bdag ni 'du
45b8('bum): byed pa'o/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni rnam par shes par byed pa'o/ /bdag gi mying dang gzugs so/ /bdag ni mying dang gzugs can no/ /bdag gi skye mched drug go/ /
46a1('bum): bdag ni skye mched drug can no/ /bdag gi reg pa'o/ /bdag ni reg par byed pa'o/ /bdag gi tshor ba'o/ /bdag ni tshor bar byed pa'o/ /bdag gi sred pa'o/ /bdag ni sred par byed pa'o/ /bdag
46a2('bum): gi len pa'o/ /bdag ni len pa can no/ /bdag gi srid pa'o/ /bdag ni srid pa can no/ /bdag gi skye ba'o/ /bdag ni skye ba'i chos can no/ /bdag gi rga shi'o/ /bdag ni rga shi'i chos can no/ /
46a3('bum): bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
46a4('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis brtson
46a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam gtan pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi shes rab kyi pha
46a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi phyi stong pa nyid do/ /
46a7('bum): bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis stong pa nyid stong
46a8('bum): pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi chen po stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la goms
46b1('bum): par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi
46b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la
46b3('bum): goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /
46b4('bum): bdag gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /
46b5('bum): bdag gi myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag
46b6('bum): gi ngo bo stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis ngo bo stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag
46b7('bum): gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so/ /bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag
46b8('bum): gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi dbang po rnams so/ /bdag gis dbang po rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi stobs rnams so/ /
47a1('bum): bdag gis stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /
47a2('bum): bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam
47a3('bum): gtan rnams so/ /bdag gis bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi tshad myed pa rnams so/ /bdag gis tshad myed pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
47a4('bum): pa rnams so/ /bdag gis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /bdag gis rnam thar pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi mthar gyis gnas
47a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
47a6('bum): pa'o/ /bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la
47a7('bum): spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag
47a8('bum): gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /bdag gis myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par
47b1('bum): bya'o/ /bdag gi so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi byams pa chen po'o/ /bdag gis byams pa chen po la spyad par bya'o/ /
47b2('bum): bdag gi snying rje chen po'o/ /bdag gis snying rje chen po la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi
47b3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /
47b4('bum): bdag ni phyir myi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rang byang chub bo/ /bdag ni rang byang chub nyid du 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rang sangs rgyas so/ /
47b5('bum): bdag ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid do/ /bdag ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bdag ni rnam pa thams
47b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
47b7('bum): stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma
47b8('bum): yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'du shes gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'du byed gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/
48a1('bum): rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ myig gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
48a2('bum): myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi
48a3('bum): gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sgra gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma
48a4('bum): yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dri gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ ro gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ reg gzung ba'i phyir bstan
48a5('bum): pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ chos gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/
48a6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gzung
48a7('bum): ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
48a8('bum): myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te
48b1('bum): reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
48b2('bum): myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
48b3('bum): myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir
48b4('bum): bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i
48b5('bum): phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
48b6('bum): myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ chu'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mye'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rlung gi khams gzung ba'i phyir
48b7('bum): bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i
48b8('bum): phyir ma yin/ ma rig pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'du byed gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
49a1('bum): myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mying dang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ skye mched drug gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i
49a2('bum): phyir ma yin/ reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sred pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
49a3('bum): myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ len pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ srid pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ skye ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan
49a4('bum): pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rga shi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/
49a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ brtson 'grus
49a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha
49a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
