78a8('bum): nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su
78b1('bum): ma skyes so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/
78b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
78b3('bum): nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin
78b4('bum): nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan gyi rjes
78b5('bum): su ma skyes so/ /yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rdzu
78b6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /dbang po
78b7('bum): rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dbang po rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /dbang po'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dbang po'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /stobs rnams kyi
78b8('bum): rjes su ma skyes/ stobs rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ stobs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /byang chub kyi yan
79a1('bum): lag rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ byang chub kyi yan lag
79a2('bum): gi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /
79a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
79a4('bum): kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan
79a5('bum): gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ bsam gtan rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ bsam gtan
79a6('bum): gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ tshad myed pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/
79a7('bum): tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las
79a8('bum): gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes
79b1('bum): so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par thar pa'i de
79b2('bum): bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las
79b3('bum): gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan
79b4('bum): gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa las gzhan
79b5('bum): gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
79b6('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /
79b7('bum): mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las
79b8('bum): gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /ting nge 'dzin kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ ting nge 'dzin kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rjes su ma
80a1('bum): skyes/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su
80a2('bum): ma skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
80a3('bum): stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ myi 'jigs
80a4('bum): pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /so so yang
80a5('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ so so yang
80a6('bum): dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /byams pa chen po'i rjes su ma skyes/ byams pa chen po las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /byams pa chen po'i de
80a7('bum): bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /snying rje chen po'i rjes su ma skyes/ snying rje chen po las gzhan gyi rjes su
80a8('bum): ma skyes so/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
80b1('bum): kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/
80b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las
80b3('bum): gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /lan
80b4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma
80b5('bum): skyes/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes
80b6('bum): su ma skyes so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rjes
80b7('bum): su ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan
80b8('bum): gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rang byang chub kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rang byang chub las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rang byang chub
81a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /
81a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams
81a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/
81a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus
81a5('bum): byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas las gzhan
81a6('bum): gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
81a7('bum): 'di ltar gang rjes su skyes pa dang / gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ gang gis
81a8('bum): rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
81b1('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste
81b2('bum): de la gzugs myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba myi dmyigs/
81b3('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du shes myi dmyigs/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid
81b4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ 'du shes nyid myi dmyigs na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
81b5('bum): 'du byed nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
81b6('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myig myi dmyigs myig gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig
81b7('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/
81b8('bum): rna ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna myi dmyigs/ sna'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
82a1('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce myi dmyigs/ lce'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus myi dmyigs/
82a2('bum): lus kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid myi dmyigs/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
82a3('bum): te/ yid nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzugs myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang
82a4('bum): myi dmyigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sgra myi dmyigs/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sgra nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
82a5('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la dri myi dmyigs/ dri'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dri nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dri'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ro myi dmyigs/ ro'i de
82a6('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ro nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ro'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la reg myi dmyigs/ reg gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ reg nyid kyang myi dmyigs
82a7('bum): na/ reg gi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos myi dmyigs/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chos nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par
82a8('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi rnam par
82b1('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
82b2('bum): myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i rnam
82b3('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
82b4('bum): te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes
82b5('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi
82b6('bum): dmyigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
82b7('bum): de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta
82b8('bum): dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i
83a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te
83a2('bum): reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid
83a3('bum): myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/
83a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
83a5('bum): de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de
83a6('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
83a7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna
83a8('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/
83b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
83b2('bum): myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
83b3('bum): ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin
83b4('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
83b5('bum): ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
83b6('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sa'i khams myi dmyigs/
83b7('bum): sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chu'i khams myi dmyigs/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
83b8('bum): chu'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mye'i khams myi dmyigs/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mye'i khams nyid kyang
84a1('bum): myi dmyigs na/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rlung gi khams myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rlung gi khams
84a2('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
84a3('bum): nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
84a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ma rig pa myi
84a5('bum): dmyigs/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed myi dmyigs/ 'du byed
84a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
84a7('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs
84a8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la skye mched drug myi dmyigs/ skye
84b1('bum): mched drug gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la reg pa myi dmyigs/ reg
84b2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba myi dmyigs/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
84b3('bum): te/ tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sred pa myi dmyigs/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sred pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs
84b4('bum): na/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la len pa myi dmyigs/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ len pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
84b5('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la srid pa myi dmyigs/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ srid pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la skye ba myi dmyigs/
84b6('bum): skye ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ skye ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rga shi myi dmyigs/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rga shi
84b7('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sbyin
84b8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims
85a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta
85a2('bum): dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/
85a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi
85a4('bum): dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan
85a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bsam gtan gyi pha
85a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ shes rab
85a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de
85a8('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi
85b1('bum): dmyigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi
85b2('bum): dmyigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de
85b3('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ chen po
85b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/
85b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'dus byas stong
85b6('bum): pa nyid myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la
85b7('bum): 'gyur/ de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
85b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mtha'
86a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi
86a2('bum): dmyigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed
86a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rang
86a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi
86a5('bum): dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la
86a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
86a7('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myi dmyigs
86a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dngos po myed
86b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na
86b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
86b3('bum): te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams myi
86b4('bum): dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la
86b5('bum): 'gyur/ de la yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
86b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs
86b7('bum): na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dbang po rnams myi dmyigs/ dbang po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dbang po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dbang
86b8('bum): po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stobs rnams myi dmyigs/ stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin
87a1('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang myi
87a2('bum): dmyigs na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
87a3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de
87a4('bum): la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin
87a5('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin
87a6('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshad myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
87a7('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
87a8('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar pa rnams myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid
87b1('bum): myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs/
87b2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
87b3('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
87b4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam
87b5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin
87b6('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ting nge 'dzin rnams myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin gyi de
87b7('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin
87b8('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi dmyigs/
88a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la
88a2('bum): 'gyur/ de la myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de
88a3('bum): la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta
88a4('bum): dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la snying rje chen po myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga
88a5('bum): la 'gyur/ de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sangs
88a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
88a7('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
88a8('bum): 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
88b1('bum): bu myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
88b2('bum): de la dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
88b3('bum): de la rang byang chub myi dmyigs/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lam
88b4('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta
88b5('bum): dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi
88b6('bum): dmyigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de
88b7('bum): bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
88b8('bum): de la tshor ba myi dmyigs/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du shes myi dmyigs/ 'du shes kyi
89a1('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'du shes nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
89a2('bum): te/ 'du byed nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par
89a3('bum): shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myig myi dmyigs/ myig gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig
89a4('bum): gi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la
89a5('bum): sna myi dmyigs/ sna'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce myi dmyigs/ lce'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
89a6('bum): lce nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus myi dmyigs/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi de bzhin
89a7('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid myi dmyigs/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la
89a8('bum): gzugs myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sgra myi dmyigs/
89b1('bum): sgra'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sgra nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dri myi dmyigs/ dri'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dri nyid kyang myi dmyigs
89b2('bum): na/ dri'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ro myi dmyigs/ ro'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ro nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ro'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
89b3('bum): de la reg myi dmyigs/ reg gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ reg nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ reg gi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos myi dmyigs/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid myi
89b4('bum): dmyigs te/ chos nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
89b5('bum): te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i rnam par
89b6('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i rnam par shes
89b7('bum): pa myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
89b8('bum): de la lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga
90a1('bum): la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi rnam par
90a2('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/
90a3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg
90a4('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs
90a5('bum): na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
90a6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce'i
90a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin
90a8('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/
90b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myig gi
90b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi
90b3('bum): dmyigs na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
90b4('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta
90b5('bum): dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg
90b6('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/
90b7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin
90b8('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi
91a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
91a2('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
91a3('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sa'i khams myi dmyigs/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sa'i khams
91a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chu'i khams myi dmyigs/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin
91a5('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mye'i khams myi dmyigs/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mye'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
91a6('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la rlung gi khams myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
91a7('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ nam mkha'i khams kyi
91a8('bum): de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang
91b1('bum): myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ma rig pa myi dmyigs/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang myi
91b2('bum): dmyigs na/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed kyi myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du byed kyi
91b3('bum): de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par
91b4('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/
91b5('bum): mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la skye mched drug myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ skye
91b6('bum): mched drug gi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la reg pa myi dmyigs/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta
91b7('bum): dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba myi dmyigs/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de
91b8('bum): la sred pa myi dmyigs/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sred pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la len pa myi dmyigs/ len pa'i de
92a1('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ len pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la srid pa myi dmyigs/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
92a2('bum): srid pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la skye ba myi dmyigs/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ skye ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ skye ba'i de bzhin
92a3('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rga shi myi dmyigs/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rga shi nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sbyin
92a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta
92a5('bum): dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi
92a6('bum): dmyigs na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi
92a7('bum): dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ brtson
92a8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/
92b1('bum): de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
92b2('bum): phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
92b3('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
92b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid
92b5('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
92b6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ stong
92b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi
92b8('bum): dmyigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa
93a1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid
93a2('bum): myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la
93a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
93a4('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mtha'
93a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
93a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa
93a7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/
93a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid
93b1('bum): myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga
93b2('bum): la 'gyur/ de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang gi mtshan
93b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
93b4('bum): myi dmyigs na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs
93b5('bum): te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
93b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
93b7('bum): pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
93b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid
94a1('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin
94a2('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs/
94a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dbang po rnams
94a4('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbang po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dbang po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stobs rnams myi dmyigs/
94a5('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs/
94a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la
94a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs
94a8('bum): na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/
94b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid myi
94b2('bum): dmyigs te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi
94b3('bum): dmyigs te/ tshad myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs/
94b4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
94b5('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar pa rnams myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs
94b6('bum): na/ rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
94b7('bum): par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin
94b8('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
95a1('bum): dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
95a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
95a3('bum): myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ting nge 'dzin rnams myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin
95a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs/
95a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la de bzhin gshegs
95a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
95a7('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang
95a8('bum): myi dmyigs na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid
95b1('bum): myi dmyigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la byams pa chen po myi dmyigs/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la snying rje chen po myi dmyigs/ snying
95b2('bum): rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
95b3('bum): myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin
95b4('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
95b5('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong
95b6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga
95b7('bum): la 'gyur/ de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
95b8('bum): 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dgra bcom pa myi dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs
96a1('bum): na/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang byang chub myi dmyigs/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang myi
96a2('bum): dmyigs na/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lam
96a3('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams
96a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga
96a5('bum): la 'gyur/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
96a6('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig
96a7('bum): rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / lha dang myi rnams kyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyam
96a8('bum): pa'i chos can drug cu ni nye bar len pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya
96b1('bum): bsnyen bkur te/ thams cad du yang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs/ shes rab bsgoms kyang / de dag
96b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas/ sbyin pa byin te/ 'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o/ /'di la sbyin
96b3('bum): par myi bya'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims so/ /bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o/ /'di ni bzod pa'o/ /bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/ /'di ni brtson 'grus so/ /bdag gis ni brtsom par
96b4('bum): bya'o/ /'di ni bsam gtan no/ /bdag gis ni mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/ /'di ni shes rab bo/ /bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/ /zhes tha dad par spyod par/ de dag
96b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas par yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong / tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam
96b6('bum): gtan la mnyam par bzhag / shes rab sgom par byed cing / de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas/ tha myi dad pa ma dmyigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par
96b7('bum): ma zhugs so/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' skyon myed par ma zhugs pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /
96b8('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems pa dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma myed pa 'am/ smon pa myed pa yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab
97a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas pas yong su ma bzung na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /gsol
97a2('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du 'dra' yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
97a3('bum): zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
97a4('bum): thabs mkhas par yongs su bzung ba dag ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du bas kyang thabs mkhas pa la brten
97a5('bum): cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la kha cig rnam pa
97a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral ba/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos 'ba' shig sgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa ma thob pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
97a7('bum): rgyas dag du 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
97a8('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos rnams la sgom zhing / thabs mkhas pa thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
97b1('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bya zhig la lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya
97b2('bum): pa 'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig yod la/ de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod la/ bya de la 'dab ma myed pa zhig ste/ de
97b3('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas so snyam nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/ gal te bya de lam nas ma la
97b4('bum): bdag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/ bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas
97b5('bum): par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang ma smas
97b6('bum): ma smad par 'dzam bu'i gling du 'dug par bya'o snyam na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/ bya de 'dzam bu'i gling de ma smas ma snad par 'dug par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
97b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung nas/ smas pa 'am snad par yang 'gyur/ 'gum pa 'am gum la thug par sdug bsngal bar
97b8('bum): yang 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lus che la mdab ma ma mchis pa de ni/ de ltar 'gyur du gdon myi 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
98a1('bum): stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims srung / bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam
98a2('bum): gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir de'i smon pa yang che/ de'i sems bskyed pa yang che/ yongs
98a3('bum): su 'dzin pa yang tshad myed du zin kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo / /de ci'i
98a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang myi ldan par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson
98a5('bum): 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas par yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/
98a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
98a7('bum): rnams kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems shing / 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs
98a8('bum): pa rnams kyi tshul khrims myi shes/ ting nge 'dzin myi shes/ shes rab myi shes/ rnam par grol ba myi shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa myi shes na/ de myi shes
98b1('bum): khong du ma chud pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i sgra thos nas/ de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar bzung zhing
98b2('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o/ /de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
98b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
98b4('bum): sngo ba de ni/ de ltar 'gyur du gdon myi za'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
98b5('bum): pa'i sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni/ shes
98b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge
98b7('bum): 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan mar myi byed de/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan mar myi 'dzin/
98b8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar myi 'dzin/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar myi 'dzin/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
99a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par myi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
99a2('bum): chen po des thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung / tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bzod pa bsgrubs kyang
99a3('bum): mtshan mar ma bzung / brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan
99a4('bum): mar ma bzung / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol
99a5('bum): ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma
99a6('bum): bzung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ba dang / mtshan ma
99a7('bum): dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgrub pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan la mnyam
99a8('bum): par gzhog pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
99b1('bum): kyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan
99b2('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus
99b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong
99b4('bum): pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dor ba myed pa
99b5('bum): stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
99b6('bum): sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
99b7('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan
99b8('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral
100a1('bum): ba'i sems kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
100a2('bum): kyis dbang po rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa dang /
100a3('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan
100a4('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshad myed pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis
100a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
100a6('bum): kyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
100a7('bum): pa myed pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang /
100a8('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma
100b1('bum): dang bral ba'i sems kyis myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis
100b2('bum): snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
100b3('bum): bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan
100b4('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang byang chub sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes
100b5('bum): pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /gsol
100b6('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
100b7('bum): bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral na/ de'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
100b8('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis
101a1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par
101a2('bum): shes pa 'am/ myig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ myig gi rnam
101a3('bum): par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes
101a4('bum): pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa/ yid
101a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
101a6('bum): tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/
101a7('bum): sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/
101a8('bum): mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
101b1('bum): 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab
101b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus
101b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong
101b4('bum): pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos
101b5('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs
101b6('bum): rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad
101b7('bum): myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par
101b8('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs
102a1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi
102a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang
102a3('bum): byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i
102a4('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom ma mchis
102a5('bum): par rig par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa ci dang ci btang ba
102a6('bum): de thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang / de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa ci dang ci bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams
102a7('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par gzhag pa dang / shes rab gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste/ bsgoms pas/ de'i slad du
102a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom
102b1('bum): ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab
102b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma
102b3('bum): myed pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o/ /tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /brtson 'grus brtsams par bgyi'o/ /bsam
102b4('bum): gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bgyi'o/ /shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o/ /nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad
102b5('bum): par bgyi'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad
102b6('bum): par bgyi'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dor ba myed
102b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /myi
102b8('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par
103a1('bum): bgyi'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dbang
103a2('bum): po rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bgyi'o/ /
103a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
103a4('bum): spyad par bgyi'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
103a5('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyad par bgyi'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /
103a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /byams pa chen po la spyad par bgyi'o/ /snying rje chen po la spyad par
103a7('bum): bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i
103a8('bum): 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rang byang chub la spyad par bgyi'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
103b1('bum): nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub
103b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid la/ chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing myi dmyigs par/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
