103b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
103b4('bum): pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o/ /lha'i bu dag ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ don dam par na gang mngon par rdzogs par
103b5('bum): 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang gi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang ma dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu
103b6('bum): dag chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du bla na
103b7('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal pa dang / bdag sems dpa' ltar na bcom
103b8('bum): ldan 'das bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ni myi dka'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang
104a1('bum): yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba
104a2('bum): yang ma mchis te/ chos thams cad ni stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i
104a3('bum): chos de lta bu ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ chos gang yang 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ yongs su 'grib par
104a4('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/ tshul khrims srung ba 'am/ bzod pa bsgom pa 'am/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'am/ bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag
104a5('bum): pa 'am/ shes rab bsgom pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom
104a6('bum): pa 'am/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ mtha'
104a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ chos
104a8('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/
104b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom
104b2('bum): pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ dbang po rnams bsgom pa 'am/ stobs rnams bsgom pa 'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa 'am/ 'phags
104b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa 'am/ tshad myed pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ gzugs
104b4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par thar
104b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsgom pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom
104b6('bum): pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa 'am/ myi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa 'am/
104b7('bum): snying rje chen po bsgom pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/
104b8('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rang byang chub bsgom pa 'am/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
105a1('bum): kyi don tu bslab pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par
105a2('bum): 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyang stong pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
105a3('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang
105a4('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
105a5('bum): myig ni myig gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna ni sna'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce ni lce'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin gyis
105a6('bum): stong ngo / /yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dri ni dri'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ro ni ro'i
105a7('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /reg ni reg gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis
105a8('bum): stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce'i rnam par
105b1('bum): shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
105b2('bum): gyis stong ngo / /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg
105b3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
105b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
105b5('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg
105b6('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus
105b7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mye'i khams ni mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis
105b8('bum): stong ngo / /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes
106a1('bum): pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i
106a2('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin
106a3('bum): gyis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis
106a4('bum): stong ngo / /skye ba ni skye ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
106a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis
106a6('bum): stong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
106a7('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
106a8('bum): ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa
106b1('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'dus byas stong pa
106b2('bum): nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa
106b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong
106b4('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang
106b5('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
106b6('bum): ngo / /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
106b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong
106b8('bum): ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis
107a1('bum): stong ngo / /stobs rnams ni stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
107a2('bum): pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam
107a3('bum): gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i
107a4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
107a5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
107a6('bum): pa myed pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi
107a7('bum): sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /myi 'jigs pa rnams
107a8('bum): ni myi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin
107b1('bum): gyis stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis
107b2('bum): stong ngo / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong
107b3('bum): ngo / /dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i rang bzhin
107b4('bum): gyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
107b5('bum): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
107b6('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so/ /tshe dang
107b7('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'di snyam du bdag gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
107b8('bum): bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams
108a1('bum): cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
108a2('bum): chos thams ca nam mkha' lta bur mos par byed kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka'
108a3('bum): ba myed na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang myi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs
108a4('bum): des na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ni dka' ba ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ba ma yin par shes so/ /rab 'byor

108b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na ci lce bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/

108b8('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa 'o na ci ro bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/

130a3('bum): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ chos nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/
130a4('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi dbyings bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
130a5('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi
130a6('bum): gnas nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha
130a7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ chos skyon myed pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
130a8('bum): de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ yang dag pa'i mtha' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/
130b1('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
130b2('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid
130b3('bum): las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/
130b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ chos nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/
130b5('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na gang bla na myed pa
130b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang
130b7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi gnas nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu
130b8('bum): yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ chos skyon myed
131a1('bum): pa nyid las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /
131a2('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/
131a3('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings las gud na gang bla na myed pa
131a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ de ltar bden pa'i tshul bzhin du chos
131a5('bum): de dag myi dmyigs na/ gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis chos
131a6('bum): kyi tshul dang rnam pa des bstan pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa myed de/ de ltar na gang zag
131a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gsum de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gsum po de dag gi/ byang chub
131a8('bum): rnam par dgod par yang myi 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'dis/ byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa ltar na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
131b1('bum): chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gnas brtan rab
131b2('bum): 'byor 'di byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu yang 'dod dam/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la dri dgos so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
131b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'dod dam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rang
131b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gsum du 'dod dam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin
131b5('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gsum du dmyigs sam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rgyu gcig gam/ rgyu gnyis sam/ rgyu gsum gyis
131b6('bum): de bzhin nyid dmyigs sam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gcig yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa tshe dang
131b7('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa de ltar bden pa'i tshul bzhin du chos de dag myi dmyigs na/ ci las tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'o/ /
131b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o/ /zhes bya bar sems par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems
132a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag myed par rab tu phye ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'jum zhing 'gong ba myed la yid la 'gyod
132a2('bum): pa myed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/
132a3('bum): rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir/ khyod kyis tshig brjod pa legs par spobs so/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang
132a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag myed par rab tu phye ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'jum zhing 'gong ba myed la yid 'gyod pa myed
132a5('bum): cing myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
132a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bla na myed pa yang dag par
132a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
132a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid du gnas
132b1('bum): par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ myi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par myi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems
132b2('bum): kyis dmyigs par bya ste/ myi mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmyigs par myi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams
132b3('bum): pa'i sems kyis dmyigs par bya ste/ brlang ba'i sems kyis dmyigs par myi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la nga rgyal myed par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la g.yo myed par bya'o/ /
132b4('bum): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ gnod pa'i sems bskyed par myi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems kyis dmyigs par bya ste/ gnod pa'i sems kyis
132b5('bum): dmyigs par myi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la khong khro ba myed pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ khong khro ba'i sems bskyed par myi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la myi 'tshe ba'i sems
132b6('bum): bskyed par bya ste/ 'tshe ba'i sems myi bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad la myi 'tshe ba'i sems kyis dmyigs par bya ste/ 'tshe ba'i sems kyis dmyigs par myi bya'o/ /sems can thams
132b7('bum): cad la ma'i sems dang / pha'i sems dang / phu nu'i sems dang / sring mo'i sems dang / grogs po dang / gnyen pa dang / rus gcig pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can thams
132b8('bum): cad la ma dang / pha'i sems dang / phu nu dang / sring mo'i sems dang / grogs po dang / gnyen pa dang / rus gcig pa'i sems kyis dmyigs par bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spang bar bya/
133a1('bum): gzhan yang srog gcod pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga'
133a2('bum): bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spang bar bya/ gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis ma byin
133a3('bum): par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spang bar bya/ gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem ba spang ba la yang dag par
133a4('bum): bskul bar bya/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /
133a5('bum): bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spang bar bya/ gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de
133a6('bum): dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phra ma spang bar bya/ gzhan yang phra ma spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang
133a7('bum): gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa spang bar bya/ gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ zhe gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa
133a8('bum): brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshig kyal ba spang bar bya/ gzhan yang tshig kyal ba spang ba la yang dag par skul
133b1('bum): bar bya/ tshig kyal ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis tshig kyal ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chags sems spang bar bya/ gzhan
133b2('bum): yang chags sems spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis chags sems spang ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag
133b3('bum): gis kyang gnod sems spang bar bya/ gzhan yang gnod sems spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa
133b4('bum): brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spang bar bya/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/
133b5('bum): gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
133b6('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdag gis kyang bsam gtan dang po la
133b7('bum): mnyam par bzhag par bya/ gzhag yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po
133b8('bum): la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag
134a1('bum): par bskul bar bya/ bsam gtan gnyis pa pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
134a2('bum): 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ bsam gtan gsum pa la
134a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyom sa par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gi kyang bsam gtan
134a4('bum): bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan yang bsam
134a5('bum): gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
134a6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang byams pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par bskul bar
134a7('bum): bya/ byams pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang snying rje chen po la mnyam par gzhag
134a8('bum): par bya/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan yang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /
134b1('bum): bdag gis kyang dga' ba la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ dga' ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de
134b2('bum): dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang btang snyoms la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ btang
134b3('bum): snyoms kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang gzugs myed pa'i
134b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i
134b5('bum): legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i
134b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang
134b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/
134b8('bum): gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
135a1('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang bzod pa'i
135a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi
135a3('bum): legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul
135a4('bum): bar bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun
135a5('bum): pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ bsam
135a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar
135a7('bum): bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
135a8('bum): legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems
135b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang
135b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang nang stong pa nyid la
135b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar
135b4('bum): bya/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang phyi stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi nang
135b5('bum): stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang phyi nang stong pa nyid
135b6('bum): la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
135b7('bum): yang dag par bskul bar bya/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
135b8('bum): 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par
136a1('bum): bya/ sems can gzhan gang chen po stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par
136a2('bum): gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la snyoms
136a3('bum): par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang dag
136a4('bum): par bskul bar bya/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga'
136a5('bum): bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
136a6('bum): nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang
136a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi legs
136a8('bum): pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha
136b1('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/

136b4('bum): pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang rang bzhin

137b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom par bya/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang

142a1('bum): 'thun pas dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas/ de myi dmyigs pa'i

148b4('bum): rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa
148b5('bum): de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po
148b6('bum): rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub
148b7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
148b8('bum): yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa
149a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad myed
149a2('bum): pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshad myed pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/
149a3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/ mthar kyis
149a4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
149a5('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin/ mngon
149a6('bum): par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin
149a7('bum): rnams yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung du
149a8('bum): myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/
149b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin
149b2('bum): pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su gzung
149b3('bum): du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
149b4('bum): bu ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung du
149b5('bum): myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin/ rang byang chub yongs su
149b6('bum): gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam pa
149b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung du myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ byang chub
149b8('bum): sems dpa' nyis stong gis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum bcu dgu'o// //
150a1('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
150a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa ni gang lags/ tshul ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ ji ltar bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni
150a3('bum): phyir myi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar 'tshal par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di
150a4('bum): la so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar bshad pa de dag thams cad kyang
150a5('bum): de bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba myed cing / rnam par rtog pa myed la gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do/ /de ni de bzhin nyid de ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jug ste/ de bzhin nyid la rnam
150a6('bum): par myi rtog cing / de ltar rnam par myi rtog par 'jug ste/ de ltar zhugs pa ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du thos nas de las 'das te/ de dag de bzhin nyid la re re dang / gnyis
150a7('bum): ka dang / gnyis ka ma yin par the tsom za ba gang yang myed do/ /de ni byung rgyal du smra ba ma yin te/ don dang ldan par smra'i/ don dang myi ldan par smra ba ma yin/ gzhan gyis byas
150a8('bum): pa dang ma byas pa la myi lta zhing legs par brjod pa tshol ba yin te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
150b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b2('bum): dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rnam pa myed pa tshul myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa'o/ /gsol pa/
150b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rnam pa ma mchis pa/ tshul ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa lags na/ chos gang rnams las slar log pa'i slad du/
150b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ phyir myi ldog pa zhes bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b5('bum): dpa' chen po gang gzugs las phyir log pa/ tshor ba las phyir log pa/ 'du shes las phyir log pa/ 'du byed las phyir log pa/ rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa/
150b6('bum): myig las phyir log pa/ rna ba las phyir log pa/ sna las phyir log pa/ lce las phyir log pa/ lus las phyir log pa/ yid las phyir log pa/ gzugs las phyir
150b7('bum): log pa/ sgra las phyir log pa/ dri las phyir log pa/ ro las phyir log pa/ reg las phyir log pa/ chos las phyir log pa/ myig gi rnam par shes pa las phyir log
150b8('bum): pa/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa/
151a1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa/ rna'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log
151a2('bum): pa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las phyir log pa/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
151a3('bum): las phyir log pa/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir log pa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir log pa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
151a4('bum): ba las phyir log pa/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir log pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir log pa/ sa'i khams las phyir log pa/
151a5('bum): chu'i khams las phyir log pa/ mye'i khams las phyir log pa/ rlung gi khams las phyir log pa/ nam mkha'i khams las phyir log pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
151a6('bum): las phyir log pa/ ma rig pa las phyir log pa/ 'du byed las phyir log pa/ rnam par shes pa las phyir log pa/ mying dang gzugs las phyir log pa/ skye mched drug las
151a7('bum): phyir log pa/ reg pa las phyir log pa/ tshor ba las phyir log pa/ sred pa las phyir log pa/ len pa las phyir log pa/ srid pa las phyir log pa/ skye ba las phyir
151a8('bum): log pa/ rga shi las phyir log pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las
151b1('bum): phyir log pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir log pa/
151b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ phyi stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ chen po stong pa nyid las
151b3('bum): phyir log pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
151b4('bum): pa nyid las phyir log pa/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/
151b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las phyir
151b6('bum): log pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir log pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las phyir log pa/ yang dag par spong ba
151b7('bum): rnams las phyir log pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las phyir log pa/ dbang po rnams las phyir log pa/ stobs rnams las phyir log pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
151b8('bum): las phyir log pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las phyir log pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las phyir log pa/ bsam gtan rnams las phyir log pa/
152a1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams las phyir log pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las phyir log pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad las phyir log pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
152a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu las phyir log pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa las phyir log pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams las phyir log
152a3('bum): pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las phyir log pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las phyir log pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las phyir log pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi las phyir log
152a4('bum): pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi las phyir log pa/ byams pa chen po las phyir log pa/ snying rje chen po las phyir log pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las phyir
152a5('bum): log pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir log pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las phyir log pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir log pa de ni/
152a6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
152a7('bum): po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa'
152a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /
152b1('bum): gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur
152b2('bum): ba'i myig gi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
152b3('bum): chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems
152b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /
152b5('bum): gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i
152b6('bum): sgra'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dri'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas
152b7('bum): par 'gyur ba'i ro'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i reg gi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems
152b8('bum): dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la
153a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i
153a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
153a3('bum): po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la
153a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna ba'i 'dus
153a5('bum): te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
153a6('bum): chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang
153a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i myig gi 'dus
153a8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub
153b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lce'i
153b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /
153b3('bum): gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
153b4('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba'i sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems
153b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mye'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /
153b6('bum): gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i
153b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems
153b8('bum): dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154a1('bum): chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mying dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /
154a2('bum): gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i reg pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshor
