154a4('bum): ba'i len pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i srid pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154a5('bum): chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i skye ba'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rga shi'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub
154a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur
154a7('bum): ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /
154a8('bum): gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
154b1('bum): po gnas par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
154b2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
154b3('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la
154b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur
154b5('bum): ba'i chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub
154b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i
154b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /
154b8('bum): gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
155a1('bum): po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo
155a2('bum): bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems
155a3('bum): dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i myi dmyigs pa stong
155a4('bum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems
155a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dngos po myed pa'i
155a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub
155a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i
155a8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa'
155b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo
155b2('bum): nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa'
155b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan
155b4('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
155b5('bum): chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar
155b6('bum): pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang
155b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma myed pa'i
155b8('bum): ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas
156a1('bum): par 'gyur ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la
156a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin
156a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems
156a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i byams
156a5('bum): pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
156a6('bum): chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
156a7('bum): 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa'
156a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dgra bcom pa nyid kyi
156b1('bum): ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
156b2('bum): po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
156b3('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid myed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ni shes par bya ba shes pa'o/ /blta bar bya ba mthong ba'o/ /
156b4('bum): yang dag par lta ba 'dogs pa 'dogs so zhes 'di las phyir rol pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze gzhan dag gi ngor myi lta ste/ de ni gnas myed cing the tsom myi za'o/ /tshul khrims
156b5('bum): dang brtul zhugs myi snyems/ lta ba ngan par myi ltung / bkra shis dang ltas kyis gtsang mar myi 'dogs te/ lha gzhan la phyag myi 'tshal zhing / me tog gam/ phreng ba
156b6('bum): 'am/ spos sam/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ ba dan dag de la sbyin cing / bya bar myi sems te/ rab 'byor
156b7('bum): rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
156b8('bum): phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can dmyal bar myi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su myi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du myi skye/
157a1('bum): lha tshe rings po'i nang du myi skye/ gang na skye bo glen zhing lkug pa dge ba'i chos myi spyod pa'i nang du myi skye/ yul mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo ma rungs pa dang / kla glo'i nang du myi
157a2('bum): skye/ log par lta ba'i rigs su myi skye/ gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra myi grag pa der myi skye ste/ de ltar myi khom pa brgyad po 'di dag gi nang du
157a3('bum): myi skye zhing / bud myed du 'gyur ba yongs su myi 'dzin te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
157a4('bum): phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung zhing spyod do/ /
157a5('bum): bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs shing / gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis srog
157a6('bum): gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' ba yin/ bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs shing / gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par skul
157a7('bum): ba yin/ ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' ba yin/ bdag gis kyang
157a8('bum): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs shing / gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod
157b1('bum): pa yin/ gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' ba yin/ bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spangs shing / gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba spong ba la
157b2('bum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' ba yin/ bdag gis
157b3('bum): kyang phra ma spangs shing / gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
157b4('bum): 'thun pas dga' ba yin/ bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa spangs shing / gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ zhe gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/
157b5('bum): gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' ba yin/ bdag gis kyang tshig kyal ba smra ba spangs shing / gzhan yang tshig kyal ba smra ba
157b6('bum): spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshig kyal ba smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis tshig kyal ba smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga'
157b7('bum): ba yin/ bdag gis kyang chags sems spangs shing / gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan
157b8('bum): gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' ba yin/ bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs shing / gzhan yang gnod sems spong
158a1('bum): ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga'
158a2('bum): ba yin/ bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs shing / gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/
158a3('bum): gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' ba yin te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i
158a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rmi lam na
158a5('bum): yang myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam myi dmyigs na/ sad pa na lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
158a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
158a7('bum): phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ngo / /nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ sems can
158a8('bum): thams cad kyi phyir tshul khrims de srung bar byed do/ /nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir bzod pa de sgom par byed do/ /nam brtson
158b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir brtson 'grus de rtsom par byed do/ /nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/
158b2('bum): sems can thams cad kyi phyir bsam gtan de la mnyam par gzhog go/ /nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir shes rab de
158b3('bum): sgom par byed de/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /
158b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du
158b5('bum): brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan
158b6('bum): pa'i chos de dang chos kyi sbyin pa bya ba'i don du kun chub par byas nas/ de chos kyi sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ba de'i tshe/ 'di snyam du chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis sems can thams cad kyi bsam
158b7('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bsams nas/ des chos kyi sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
158b8('bum): sngo ste/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
159a1('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos zab mo la nem nur myed/ the tsom myed/
159a2('bum): yid gnyis myed do/ /gsol pa/ gcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos zab mo la nem nur ma mchis/ the tsom ma mchis/
159a3('bum): yid gnyis ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos gang yang yang dag par
159a4('bum): rjes su mthong ba myed/ gang la nem nur ram/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom du 'gyur ba'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gam/
159a5('bum): rna ba 'am sna 'am lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
159a6('bum): 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
159a7('bum): 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i
159a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
159b1('bum): 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes
159b2('bum): pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa
159b3('bum): 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus
159b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
159b5('bum): dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/
159b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad
159b7('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/
159b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po
160a1('bum): rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam
160a2('bum): gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
160a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma myed pa 'am/ smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo
160a4('bum): rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying
160a5('bum): rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
160a6('bum): bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su myi
160a7('bum): mthong ngo / /rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /
160a8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lus kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/
160b1('bum): yid kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par
160b2('bum): rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/
160b3('bum): byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig
160b4('bum): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la mos pa dang / gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid
160b5('bum): dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tsom gyi sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dang lhan cig tu myi gnas te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub
160b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni/ bag la nyal ba thams cad
160b7('bum): du thams cad myed de/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab
160b8('bum): 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro zhing 'ong yang / nor ba'i sems kyis myi 'gro/ nor ba'i sems kyis myi 'ong ste/ de 'gro 'am 'ong na
161a1('bum): yang dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'gro/ dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'ong ste/ de dran bzhin du 'gro/ dran bzhin du 'ong / dran bzhin du 'chag /dran bzhin du sdod/ dran bzhin du 'dug /
161a2('bum): dran bzhin du nyal te/ de 'phral la sa las rkang pa myi 'deg /'phral la sa las rkang pa myi 'jog ste/ dran bzhin du rkang pa 'deg /dran bzhin du rkang pa 'jog cing / de sa'i phyogs
161a3('bum): mthong bzhin du 'gro ste/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /
161a4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gos kyi tshags la smad du myed pa yin/ rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a5('bum): dpa' chen po ni gtsang sgra'i spyod pa dang ldan te/ gtsang zhing dri nga ba myed la/ rngul dang dri ma dang bral zhing nad nyung ba yin te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de
161a6('bum): dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang myir 'gyur ba rnams kyi lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag
161a7('bum): brgyad cu lus de nyid la za ba yod pa de dag kyang / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
161a8('bum): myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/
161b1('bum): 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po de dag myed de/ rab 'byor ji lta ji
161b2('bum): l tar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin
161b3('bum): to/ /ngag yongs su dag pa yongs 'dzin to/ /sems yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang
161b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
161b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus yongs su dag pa lags/ ngag yongs su dag pa lags/ sems yongs su dag pa lags/
161b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
161b7('bum): gi lus dang / ngag dang sems myi drang ba dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gya gyu yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ de yang de lta de ltar lus kyis legs par spyad pa rnam pa gsum spyod do/ /
161b8('bum): ngag gis legs par spyad pa rnam pa bzhi spyod do/ /yid kyis legs par spyad pa rnam pa gsum spyod de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang
162a1('bum): sems yongs su dag pa'o/ /de lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag pa des/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon
162a2('bum): du myi byed de/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de
162a3('bum): dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
162a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin/ phyag dar khrod pa lhur len pa ma yin/
162a5('bum): stan gcig pa lhur len pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms phyis myi len pa lhur len pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin/ dgon pa lhur len pa ma yin/ shing drung lhur
162a6('bum): len pa ma yin/ bla gab myed pa lhur len pa ma yin/ dur khrod lhur len pa ma yin/ cog pu lhur len pa ma yin/ gnas ji bzhin lhur len pa ma yin/ chos gos gsum pa lhur
162a7('bum): len pa ma yin zhing / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyang / yang dag par blangs te spyod do/ /rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang
162a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ser sna'i sems
162b1('bum): skye ba myed do/ /tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems skye ba myed do/ /'khrug pa'i sems skye ba myed do/ /le lo'i sems skye ba myed do/ /mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems skye ba myed do/ /
162b2('bum): shes rab 'chal ba'i sems skye ba myed do/ /phrag dog gi sems skye ba myed do/ /rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
162b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni blo brtan pa yin/ blo zab pa yin/
162b4('bum): gus par gzhan la chos nyan pa yin/ gzhan las chos gang ci thos kyang / de thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag pa sgrub pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i bya ba gang
162b5('bum): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/ chos nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub cing / chos gang chos kyi dbyings dang myi 'byor ba de lta bu gang yang yang dag par
162b6('bum): rjes su myi mthong ste/ de thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'byor pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba yin te/ rab 'byor de dag ni phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
162b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i phyir myi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de la gal te phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bdud sdig to
162b8('bum): can gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad mngon du sprul nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po de re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag
163a1('bum): mang po/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag mang po/ byang chub sems dpa'
163a2('bum): bye ba stong phrag mang po/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po bsreg cing btso ba dang / myi bzad par sdug bsngal
163a3('bum): ba dang / rtsub pa dang / tsha ba'i tshor ba myong bar mngon du sprul nas bstan te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni phyir myi ldog
163a4('bum): par de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa yin te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po 'dir skyes so/ /khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas phyir myi ldog par lung bstan pa ni/ sems can
163a5('bum): dmyal ba par lung bstan te/ da dung yang khyod kyis byang chub gyi sems 'di thong shig dang / khyod sems can dmyal bar skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de ltar byas nas khyod mtho ris su 'gro
163a6('bum): bar 'gyur ro zhes zer yang / rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'khrug cing nem nur myed the tsom myed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
163a7('bum): dpa' chen po de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lung bstan par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
163a8('bum): dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te/ phyir myi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs myed pa ste/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
163b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas myed do/ /rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de
163b2('bum): dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
163b3('bum): chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge sbyong gi cha byad du 'ongs te/ 'di skad du gang khyod kyis sngon 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis
163b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
163b5('bum): yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar
163b6('bum): bdag gis nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag
163b7('bum): gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /
163b8('bum): 'di ltar bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
164a1('bum): nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /
164a2('bum): 'di ltar bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid
164a3('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag
164a4('bum): gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
164a5('bum): yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag
164a6('bum): gis dbang po rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /
164a7('bum): 'di ltar bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis bsam
164a8('bum): gtan rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su
164b1('bum): sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /
164b2('bum): 'di ltar bdag gis stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis mtshan ma myed pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis smon pa myed pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /
164b3('bum): 'di ltar bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams
164b4('bum): yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar
164b5('bum): bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis byams pa chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis snying rje chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /
164b6('bum): 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis lam gyi
164b7('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
164b8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes nas thos par gyur pa de shogs shig / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
165a1('bum): sangs rgyas nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su
165a2('bum): yi rang ba de dag kyang so sor shogs shig thong shig / gang khyod kyis thos pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin te/
165a3('bum): de ni rang bzor byas pa'o/ /gang ngas bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o zhes zer la/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
165a4('bum): 'khrug cing nem nur byed la/ the tsom za na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lung
165a5('bum): ma bstand par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni ma nges pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa ma yin no/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
165a6('bum): dpa' chen po myi 'khrug cing / nem nur myi byed cing / the tsom myi za la/ chos nyid la rten cing mngon par 'du ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa la rten te/ gzhan la yid ches par myi 'gro zhing / sbyin pa'i
165a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
165a8('bum): la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /nang stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /
165b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /phyi nang stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /chen po stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /
165b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /'dus byas stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /mtha' las 'das pa stong
165b3('bum): pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi
165b4('bum): dring myi 'jog / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /
165b5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /dran pa nye bar gzhag
165b6('bum): pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog / yang dag par spong ba rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /dbang po rnams la gzhan gyi dring
165b7('bum): myi 'jog / stobs rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /
165b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /bsam gtan rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /tshad myed pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
166a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog / rnam par thar pa brgyad la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /rnam par thar pa'i
166a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /mngon par shes pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /ting nge 'dzin rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /gzungs
166a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /myi 'jigs pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /so so yang dag par rig pa gzhi la gzhan
166a4('bum): gyi dring myi 'jog / byams pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /snying rje chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /rgyun tu zhugs
166a5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /dgra bcom pa nyid la gzhan gyi
166a6('bum): dring myi 'jog / rang byang chub la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa dang / 'di ltar dper na/ dgra bcom pa
166a7('bum): zag pa zad pa ni gzhan la yid ches pas myi 'gro zhing chos nyid mngon du gyur pas bdud sdig to can gyis myi 'phrogs pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
166a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po yang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis myi thub pa yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi
166b1('bum): ldog pa'i chos can yin/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te/ phyir myi ldog pa'i khams su gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa yin/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
166b2('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yid ches pas kyang myi 'gro na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ /rang
166b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la yid ches par 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ /bdud sdig to can la yid chas pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas
166b4('bum): myed do/ /mu stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu ba gzhan dag la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang la yid ches pas
166b5('bum): 'gro ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gzugs sam gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /tshor ba 'am tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su
166b6('bum): myi mthong ngo / /'du shes sam 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /'du byed dam/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /rnam par shes
166b7('bum): pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /myig gam/ myig gi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /rna ba 'am/ rna ba'i
166b8('bum): de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /sna 'am/ sna'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /lce 'am/ lce'i de bzhin nyid
167a1('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /lus sam lus kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /yid dam yid kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /gzugs

171b1('bum): du gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su

172a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang /

172b1('bum): gnas par bgyi zhes/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi don du kun dris shing yongs su zhus pa rnams la bstan par 'dod dam/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
172b2('bum): gis gang bshad pa la de bzhin du gnas te/ de bzhin du brtson par byas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
172b3('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ de ltar btams pa dang / de ltar bstan pa dang / de ltar gnas pa dang / de ltar slob slob pa rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams
172b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/ khyod kyis lta bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur re skan zhes brjod de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
172b5('bum): po de la/ snying brnyan bcug kyang de'i sems gzhan du myi 'gyur la/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing / gong du yang dge slong 'di ni de ltar bdag la chags pa gang gis
172b6('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang thob par myi 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang thob par myi 'gyur/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang dag thob par myi 'gyur/ dgra
172b7('bum): bcom pa nyid kyang thob par myi 'gyur/ rang byang chub kyang thob par myi 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang thob par myi 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par
172b8('bum): myi 'gyur ba'i chags pa ston pa ni/ bdag la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes dga' ba skyes pas/ bdud sdig to can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i sems la zhum
173a1('bum): pa myed par rig nas/ sa'i phyogs de nyid du dge slong mang po mngon par sprul te/ dge slong 'di dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug 'jug pa sha
173a2('bum): stag ste/ de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par gyur na/ khyod ltas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur re skan zhes zer
173a3('bum): yang / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste/ 'di ni bdud sdig to can te/ lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173a4('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog cing / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
173a5('bum): yang myi ltung la/ de las kyang gong du 'di snyam ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
173a6('bum): la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa da nga / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab
173a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
173a8('bum): myi rgya ba'i gnas myed skabs myed de/ de ni gnas ma yin no snyam na/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
173b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
173b2('bum): tshe/ 'di snyam du gal te de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstan pa de ltar bslabs la spyod pa de dang ma bral zhing pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'di dag gis spyod pa de ni/

174b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni gzugs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ /tshor ba'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ /'du shes kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ /

174b8('bum): ldog go/ /'dod chags kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ /zhe sdang gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ /gti mug gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ /lta ba'i rnam pa'i 'du shes
175a1('bum): las phyir ldog go/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ /stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog

175b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug ste/ des chos rdul tsam yang dmyigs pa myed do/ /dmyigs pa myed pas mngon par 'du myi byed do/ /mngon par 'du myi byed par skye ba myed de/

176a1('bum): cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o chos 'di dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/

176a3('bum): gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de dag gang yang myi dmyigs te/ chos
