179a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin lhur len pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams lhur len pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lhur len pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi lhur len pa ma yin/ so so
179a3('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi lhur len pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po lhur len pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po lhur len pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad lhur len
179a4('bum): pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lhur len pa ma yin/
179a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid lhur len pa ma yin/ rang byang chub lhur len pa ma yin/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lhur len pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
179a6('bum): par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas blta ba lhur len pa ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lhur len pa ma
179a7('bum): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la lhur blang ba
179a8('bum): bskyed pa dang / gang gis skyed pa dang / gang la bskyed par bya ba'i chos de lta bar gang yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni
179b1('bum): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/ /rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yid la
179b2('bum): bya ba de dang ldan pas spyod lam bzhir 'gro 'am/ 'ong na yang nor ba'i sems kyis myi 'gro/ nor ba'i sems kyis myi 'ong / nor ba'i sems kyis myi ldang / nor ba'i
179b3('bum): sems kyis myi 'chag / nor ba'i sems kyis myi 'dug /nor ba'i sems kyis myi nyal te/ de dran bzhin du 'gro'o/ /dran bzhin du 'ong ngo / /dran bzhin du 'chag go/ /
179b4('bum): dran bzhin du ldang ngo / /dran bzhin du 'dug go/ /dran bzhin du nyal lo/ /rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
179b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni khyim na gnas kyang thabs mkhas
179b6('bum): pas sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar len to/ /de sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ zas 'dod pa la zas/ skom
179b7('bum): 'dod pa la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa la gos/ mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog /bdug pa 'dod pa la bdug pa/ spos
179b8('bum): 'dod pa la spos/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa/ gnas 'dod pa la gnas/ nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang /
180a1('bum): mal shel dang / byi ru dang / ser dang / dngul 'dod pa la/ nor dang 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang /
180a2('bum): 'tshog cas dang / yo byad gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang de 'dod pa rnams la yongs su gtong ste/ de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
180a3('bum): dag par skul lo/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/ /gzhan gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed do/ /bdag
180a4('bum): kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/ gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan
180a5('bum): gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed do/ /bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/ gzhan yang bzod pa'i
180a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing 'thun pas
180a7('bum): dga' bar byed do/ /bdag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
180a8('bum): pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed do/ /bdag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha
180b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan gang bsam gtan
180b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar byed do/ /bdag kyang shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
180b3('bum): pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga'
180b4('bum): bar byed do/ /rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni khyim na gnas na/ 'dzam bu'i gling rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa
180b5('bum): yongs su gtong / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis
180b6('bum): yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
180b7('bum): rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang de 'dod pa la yongs su myi spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par tshangs par spyod pa yin/ gnod pa gang gis
180b8('bum): gzhan myi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnod pa de lta bu gang yang myi skyed de/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang / ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
181a1('bum): phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyi bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po myi
181a2('bum): thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ 'di bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /
181a3('bum): bdag gis rtag tu rgyun myi chad par rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rtag tu rgyun myi chad par rjes su 'brang ngo / /ji tsam du lag na rdo rje'i rigs rnams
181a4('bum): rtag tu rgyun myi chad par rjes su 'brang ba de tsam du/ de la myi 'am myi ma yin pa dag gis gnod par myi nus te/ de la 'jig rten na lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am gang sus kyang chos dang 'thun
181a5('bum): par thub pa myed de/ de'i sems byang chub yid la byed pa nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rnam par 'khrug pa myed do/ /byang chub
181a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dbang po 'di lta ste/ myig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po
181a7('bum): dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dag ma tshang bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de ni skyes bu
181a8('bum): dam par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dma' ba ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu dam par 'gyur zhing skyes bu dma' ba ma lags/
181b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam byang chub kyi sems myi 'khrug pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
181b2('bum): skyes bu dam par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dma' ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
181b3('bum): dag ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub yid la bya ba dang ldan zhing / bud myed ze slong ba dang /
181b4('bum): dbang du 'gyur ba'i sngags dang / tshig gang ci yang rung ste/ ci de dag thams cad rnam pa thams cad du/ thams cad myi sbyor sbyor du myi 'jug ste/ ze slong ba'i bag gzhan dang
181b5('bum): gzhan dag kyang myi phyed do/ /bud myed dam skyes pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag la yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul myi byed do/ /bu 'am bu mo'i rigs kyi lha lta bu yong bar 'gyur ro
181b6('bum): zhe 'am/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes yongs su ston pa'i cho 'phrul myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
181b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bas/
181b8('bum): 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang / ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
182a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang /
182a2('bum): mtshan ma gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog par rig par bya ba'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma de dag bstan kyis shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung
182a3('bum): shig dang bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab
182a4('bum): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub yid la byed pa dang myi 'bral ba yin te/ phung po'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi
182a5('bum): gnas/ khams kyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ skye mched kyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so/ /
182a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des phung po stong pa nyid shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ khams stong pa nyid shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ skye mched
182a7('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ de 'du 'dzi'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
182a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can stong pa nyid shin tu yid la byas pa yin/ de rgyal po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i
182b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang la yang bzang po 'am/ ngan par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /de rkun po'i gtan gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/
182b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas chos gang la yang blang ba 'am/ dbrog pa yang dag par rjes du myi mthong ngo / /de dag yul gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su
182b3('bum): brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang nyung ngu 'am/ mang por yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /dmag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson
182b4('bum): par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas pas/ chos gang la yang byams pa 'am/ zhe sdang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /grong gi
182b5('bum): gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pas/ chos gang yang tshogs sam/ tshogs ma yin par
182b6('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /grong khyer gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de nam mkha' stong pa nyid la gnas par/ chos
182b7('bum): gang yang gzung ba 'am/ myi gzung bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /grong rdal gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de yang dag
182b8('bum): pa'i mtha' la gnas pas/ chos gang yang 'phel ba 'am/ 'brib par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /bdag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/
183a1('bum): sems can gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ srog gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ 'gro ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par
183a2('bum): myi gnas/ gso' ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ skyes bu'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ gang zag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson
183a3('bum): par myi gnas/ shed can gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ shed bdag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ byed pa po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson
183a4('bum): par myi gnas/ tshor ba po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ shes pa po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas/ mthong ba po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson
183a5('bum): par myi gnas te/ gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la rjes su brtson zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas te/ de sbyin
183a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / ser sna'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims ngan pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas
183a7('bum): so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'khrug pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / le lo'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so/ /
183a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / g.yeng ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi gnas so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab 'chal ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par myi
183b1('bum): gnas so/ /de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing / chos 'dod pa yin gyi chos myi 'dod pa ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings la spyod cing / chos tha dad pa'i legs pa brjod pa ma yin/ de sangs rgyas
183b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bshes gnyen du sems pa yin/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
183b3('bum): kyi theg pa pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul zhing dgod do/ /'dul lo/ /rab tu gzhog go/ /de de bzhin gshegs
183b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed cing / blta ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho ba dang / skyong ba der skyes te/ der
183b5('bum): skye bar 'dod cing / 'di ltar sangs rgyas yid la bya bas nyin mtshan du rnam par spyod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de na 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
183b6('bum): ni phal cher 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba bskyed cing / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan dang po bskyed/
183b7('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa bskyed/ bsam gtan gsum pa bskyed/ bsam gtan bzhi pa bskyed/ byams pa bskyed/ snying rje bskyed/ dga' ba bskyed/ btang snyoms bskyed/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
183b8('bum): la snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed/ chung zad myed pa'i skyed mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed cing /
184a1('bum): gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur par bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa der skyes te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag
184a2('bum): dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
184a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
184a4('bum): nyid la gnas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / mtha'
184a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / chos thams
184a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong
184a7('bum): pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa dang /
184a8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa dang / dbang po rnams la gnas pa dang / stobs rnams la gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
184b1('bum): brgyad pa la gnas pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la gnas pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
184b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
184b3('bum): smon pa myed pa la gnas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
184b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la gnas pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas pa dang / byams pa chen po la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen
184b5('bum): po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas pa ni 'di snyam du bdag ni phyir ldog pa'am/ phyir myi ldog pa ma yin no snyam yang myi byed de/ de the tsom myi
184b6('bum): skye zhing rang gi sa la yid gnyis myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des phyir ldog pa dang / phyir ldog pa ma yin pa'i chos rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su myi
184b7('bum): mthong ngo / /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i skyes bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i sa la gnas pa ni/ rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o/ /lan cig
184b8('bum): phyir 'ong ba/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i sa la gnas pa ni rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba phyir myi 'ong ba'i sa la gnas pa ni/ rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom
185a1('bum): myi za'o/ /dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa'i sa la gnas pa ni/ rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o/ /rang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni/ rang gi sa la nem
185a2('bum): nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ni/ rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
185a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni/ rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi
185a4('bum): sa la gnas pa yang nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za zhing de phyir myi ldog pa'i sa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong ngo / /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par
185a5('bum): byed do/ /bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag kyang shes te/ bdud kyi las kyi dbang du yang myi 'gro'o/ /bdud kyi las de dag thams cad kyang rnam par 'jom zhing srab mor byed do/ /rab 'byor
185a6('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshams myed pa byed byed pa'i skyes bu ni 'chi ka'i bar du yang mtshams myed pa'i sems dang myi 'bral zhing / mtshams myed pa'i sems de rjes su 'brang ngo / /mtshams
185a7('bum): myed pa'i sems de thams cad kyis kyang rnam par gzhil bar myi nus te/ kun nas ldang ba de 'chi ga'i bar du yang rjes su 'brang ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir myi ldog pa'i
185a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sems kyang phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ste/ sems de rnam par brtag tu myed cing myi sgul bas/ de ni lha dang myi dang
185b1('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyir bzlog par myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems des lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te/ yang dag
185b2('bum): pa'i skyon myed pa la zhugs pas de rang gi sa la gnas shing mngon par shes pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /sems
185b3('bum): can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang / de dag la phyag bya ba dang / chos mnyam pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
185b4('bum): yang 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang bskyed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la kun 'dri zhing yongs su
185b5('bum): zhu ba byed bsnyen bkur byed do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar gnas pas bdud kyi las skyes shing / byung ba rnams khong du chud de/ bdud kyi las
185b6('bum): skyes shing byung ba dag gi dbang du yang myi 'gro'o/ /bdud kyi las de dag kyang thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la sbyor bar byed cing / de rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za'o/ /
185b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i mtha' la nem nur myed pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gcig gam gnyis su yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar shes pas
185b8('bum): de tshe 'phos nas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sems myi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ chos
186a1('bum): thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /rab
186a2('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de tshe 'phos nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
186a3('bum): myi 'gyur ro snyam myi byed de/ gdon myi za bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
186a4('bum): rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi sa la de ltar
186a5('bum): gnas pa ni/ rang gi sa la thub pa myed pa yin te de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa ni myi
186a6('bum): 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin te/ rab 'byor gal te phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du/ bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad
186a7('bum): du nye bar 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di nyid du dgra bcom pa thob par gyis shig /khyod ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /de bzhin
186a8('bum): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod
186b1('bum): pa khyod kyis ma thob bo/ /rnam pa gang dag dang / tshul gang dag dang mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i
186b2('bum): rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag kyang khyod la myed do/ /zhes zer yang / rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de thos
186b3('bum): nas/ myi 'jum myi 'gong zhing de'i sems gzhan du myi 'gyur la yid skrag par myi 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdag ni de
186b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de ci'i
186b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
186b6('bum): par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag la yod do zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gal te bdud sdig to can nam/ bdud kyi byin kyis brlabs pa'i skyes
186b7('bum): bu zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
186b8('bum): lung bstan kyang / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
187a1('bum): sangs rgyas rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang dag par skul ba myi
187a2('bum): mdzad de/ kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig to can nam/ bdud sdig to can gyis byin kyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu zhig sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs so snyam sems
187a3('bum): pa dang / gal te rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa la bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi
187a4('bum): cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas/ de la 'di skad du gang la khyod spyod pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni bdud kyis bshad pa yin te/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
187a5('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa ma yin no zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ kye ma gang bdag bla na myed pa
187a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang 'bral bar byed pa 'di ni bdud sdig to can nam/ bdud kyis byin kyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu'o/ /zhes bya bar rig par byed na/
187a7('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na
187a8('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o/ /
187b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag ni de la yod do/ /rab 'byor
187b2('bum): rnam pa de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub
187b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir bdag kyang yongs su gtong la srog yongs su chad
187b4('bum): par 'gyur yang sdod cing chos de yongs su myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'di ltar brtson
187b5('bum): par byed de/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su myi gtong ba de
187b6('bum): ltar brtson par byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
187b7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod par gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de la chos gang gi don du byang chub sems
187b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag yongs su gtong zhing / srog yongs su chad par 'gyur yang sdod pa'i chos de gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
188a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad stong ngo zhes chos ston te/ de la skyes bu blun po la la 'di ni chos ma yin 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin/ 'di ni ston
188a2('bum): pas bstan pa ma yin no zhes phyir rgol zhing ngan du rjod de/ rab 'byor chos de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag yongs su chad
188a3('bum): par 'gyur yang myi gtong ngo / /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa
188a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi nang du bdag kyang grangs su gzhug go/ /bdag kyang der lung bstan to/ /chos gang phyir bdag yongs su gtong ba dang / srog yongs su chad
188a5('bum): par 'gyur yang myi gtong ba de yang bdag gi chos so zhes bslab bo/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas/ dam pa'i
188a6('bum): chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bdag kyang yongs su gtong la/ srog yongs su chad pa yin yang sdod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma
188a7('bum): de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
188a8('bum): dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston pa la nem nur myed/ the tsom myi za zhing gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsung pa
188b1('bum): de thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ /de ltar bzung nas kyang chud za bar myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzungs rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan
188b2('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang thob par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo rnams chab myi 'tshal pa
188b3('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor myi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs rab tu thob pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ de bzhin gshegs pas
188b4('bum): gsungs pa'i mdo' rnams chud myi za'o/ /de bzhin du rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad po rnam par bkod pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas/ byang chub sems
188b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo' rnams chud myi za'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
188b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'ba' shig / chab myi 'tshal du bas kyi/ nyan thos kyis bshad pa ma lags sam/ lhas bshad pa ma lags
188b7('bum): sam/ klus bshad pa ma lags sam/ gnod sbyin gyis bshad pa ma lags sam/ dri zas bshad pa ma lags sam/ lha ma yin gyis bshad pa ma lags
188b8('bum): sam/ nam mkha' lding gis bshad pa ma lags sam/ lto 'phye chen pos bshad pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
189a1('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ skad dang / brda' dang / sgra gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la nem nur myed/ the tsom myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar des gzungs rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
189a2('bum): rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
189a3('bum): pa las/ phyir myi ldog pa'i rnam pa dang / tshul gyi le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gcig go// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ de skad ces
189a4('bum): bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan chen
189a5('bum): po dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /
189a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bskyod du ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
189a7('bum): no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
189a8('bum): chen po ni tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bskyod du myed pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /
189b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes mtha' yas mu myed pa rab tu thob ste/ ye shes de la gnas shing phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
189b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par bsgrub pa gang gis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dris kyang lan zad par myi nus pa'i/ so so yang dag par rig pa
189b3('bum): mngon par sgrub bo/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par yang rnam pa gang
189b4('bum): dang tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por brjod pa'i phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan
189b5('bum): ma rnams ston pa'i mthu' mnga' na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
189b6('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / stobs lnga
189b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / 'phags pa'i
189b8('bum): bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i
190a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su
190a2('bum): rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /
190a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / myi 'jigs
190a4('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyid
190a5('bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /
190a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gnas zab mo zab mo rnams legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /rab
190a7('bum): 'byor khyod de ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don tu de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas zab mo zab mo rnams dri bar sems pa legs so/ /rab 'byor zab mo zhes bya ba 'di
190a8('bum): ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /'di ni mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa
190b1('bum): dang zhi ba dang de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ gang mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas de dag ni gnas zab mo zhes bya ba de dag go/ /
190b2('bum): gsol pa/ de mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas su bas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor zab mo zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi tshig bla
190b3('bum): dgas kyang yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs zab bo/ /rab 'byor tshor ba zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'du shes zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'du byed zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor myig kyang
190b4('bum): zab bo/ /rab 'byor rna ba yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor sna yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor lce yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor lus kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor yid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor gzugs kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor sgra yang zab bo/ /
190b5('bum): rab 'byor dri yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor ro yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor reg kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor chos kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang
190b6('bum): zab bo/ /rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang zab bo/ /
190b7('bum): rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus
190b8('bum): te reg pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang zab bo/ /rab
191a1('bum): 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor
191a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor sa'i khams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor chu'i khams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor mye'i khams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyang zab bo/ /
191a3('bum): rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor ma rig pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'du byed kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang zab bo/ /rab
191a4('bum): 'byor mying dang gzugs kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor skye mched drug kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor reg pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor tshor ba yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor sred pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor len pa yang zab bo/ /rab
191a5('bum): 'byor srid pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor skye ba yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rga shi yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang zab bo/ /rab
191a6('bum): 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
191a7('bum): tu phyin pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab
191a8('bum): 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor mtha' las
191b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid zab bo/ /rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor
191b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor
191b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang zab bo/ /
191b4('bum): rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor
191b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor tshad myed pa rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor
191b6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam par
191b7('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo
191b8('bum): rnams kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zab bo/ /rab 'byor
192a1('bum): byams pa chen po yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor snying rje chen po yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang zab bo/ /
192a2('bum): rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang zab bo/ /rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang zab bo/ /rab
192a3('bum): 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyang zab bo/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na gzugs zab/ ji ltar na
192a4('bum): tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na 'du shes zab/ ji ltar na 'du byed zab/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na myig zab/ ji ltar na rna ba zab/ ji ltar na sna zab/ ji ltar na lce zab/ ji ltar na lus
192a5('bum): zab/ ji ltar na yid zab/ ji ltar na gzugs zab/ ji ltar na sgra zab/ ji ltar na dri zab/ ji ltar na ro zab/ ji ltar na reg zab/ ji ltar na chos zab/ ji ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa zab/
192a6('bum): ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par

192a8('bum): reg pa zab/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
192b1('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab/
192b2('bum): ji ltar na sa'i khams zab/ ji ltar na chu'i khams zab/ ji ltar na mye'i khams zab/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams zab/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams zab/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams
192b3('bum): zab/ ji ltar na ma rig pa zab/ ji ltar na 'du byed zab/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa zab/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs zab/ ji ltar na skye mched drug zab/ ji ltar na reg pa zab/ ji ltar na tshor ba

192b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na chen po
192b7('bum): stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar
192b8('bum): na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na
193a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

193a8('bum): pa shes pa nyid zab/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab ce na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab bo/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba zab bo/ /
193b1('bum): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du shes zab bo/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'du byed zab bo/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zab bo/ /myig gi
193b2('bum): de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du myig zab bo/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba zab bo/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sna zab bo/ /lce'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lce zab bo/ /lus

195a1('bum): stong pa nyid zab bo/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab bo/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab bo/ /mtha'

195a8('bum): de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zab bo/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dbang po rnams zab bo/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du stobs rnams zab bo/ /byang chub kyi
195b1('bum): yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zab bo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab bo/ /

195b3('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du tshad myed pa rnams zab bo/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab bo/ /

195b5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams zab bo/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zab bo/ /mngon par shes
195b6('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams zab bo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams zab bo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta
195b7('bum): ba de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zab bo/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de
195b8('bum): bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du myi 'jigs pa rnams zab bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zab bo/ /byams pa chen
196a1('bum): po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byams pa chen po zab bo/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du snying rje chen po zab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de
196a2('bum): bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab bo/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab bo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong
196a3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab bo/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab bo/ /dgra bcom
196a4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid zab bo/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rang byang chub zab bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lam gyi
196a5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid zab bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
196a6('bum): ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni
196a7('bum): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i de bzhin
196a8('bum): nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lce'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu
196b1('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sgra'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
196b2('bum): 'das dri'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das ro'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das reg gi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi de bzhin
196b3('bum): nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/
196b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
196b5('bum): de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/
196b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus
196b7('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg
196b8('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
197a1('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
197a2('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de
197a3('bum): bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mye'i khams
197a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
197a5('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
197a6('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/
197a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
197a8('bum): len pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom
197b1('bum): ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
197b2('bum): de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/
197b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji
197b4('bum): lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi
197b5('bum): de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
197b6('bum): 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed
197b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
197b8('bum): ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das myi
198a1('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/
198a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu
198a3('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
198a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/
198a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji
198a6('bum): lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das
198a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/
198a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu
198b1('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i
198b2('bum): de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/
198b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das phyir myi 'ong ba'i
198b4('bum): 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das lam
198b5('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs
198b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang myed/ gzugs las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la/ tshor ba yang myed/ tshor ba las gud na yang
198b7('bum): de bzhin nyid myed de/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du shes kyang myed/ 'du shes las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /
198b8('bum): rab 'byor 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ 'du byed kyang myed/ 'du byed las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la
199a1('bum): rnam par shes pa yang myed/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor myig gi de bzhin nyid de la/ myig kyang myed/ myig
199a2('bum): las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ myig gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i de bzhin nyid de la/ rna ba yang myed/ rna ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /
199a3('bum): rab 'byor sna'i de bzhin nyid de la/ sna yang myed/ sna las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ sna'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor lce'i de bzhin nyid de la/ lce yang myed/ lce las gud na yang de bzhin nyid
199a4('bum): myed de/ lce'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor lus kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ lus kyang myed/ lus las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor yid kyi
199a5('bum): de bzhin nyid de la/ yid kyang myed/ yid las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang myed/ gzugs las gud na yang
199a6('bum): de bzhin nyid myed de/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor sgra'i de bzhin nyid de la sgra yang myed/ sgra las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor dri'i
199a7('bum): de bzhin nyid de la dri yang myed/ dri las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ dri'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor ro'i de bzhin nyid de la/ ro yang myed/ ro las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ ro'i
199a8('bum): de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor reg gi de bzhin nyid de la/ reg kyang myed/ reg las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ reg gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ chos kyang myed
199b1('bum): chos las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang myed/ myig gi rnam par shes pa las gud
199b2('bum): na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang myed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang
199b3('bum): de bzhin nyid myed de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang myed/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid
199b4('bum): myed de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang myed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lce'i
199b5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang myed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lus kyi
199b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang myed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ yid kyi rnam
199b7('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ myig gi 'dus
199b8('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
200a1('bum): de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
200a2('bum): de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta
200a3('bum): bu'o/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de
200a4('bum): lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang / de bzhin nyid myed de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de
200a5('bum): lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myed/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid
200a6('bum): myed de/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myed/ rna ba'i 'dus
200a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la/
200a8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor lce'i
200b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
200b2('bum): kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
200b3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de la/
200b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de
200b5('bum): lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ sa'i khams kyang myed/ sa'i khams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor chu'i
200b6('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ chu'i khams yang myed/ chu'i khams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la/
200b7('bum): mye'i khams kyang myed/ mye'i khams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ rlung gi khams kyang myed/
200b8('bum): rlung gi khams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la nam mkha'i khams kyang myed/ nam mkha'i
201a1('bum): khams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang myed/
201a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de la ma rig pa yang myed/ ma rig pa las gud na yang
201a3('bum): de bzhin nyid myed de/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de la 'du byed kyang myed 'du byed las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /

201a5('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de la/ mying dang gzugs kyang myed/ mying dang gzugs las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid
201a6('bum): de la skye mched drug kyang myed/ skye mched drug las gud na yang de bzhin nyid myed de/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /rab 'byor reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de la reg pa yang myed/ reg pa las
