266b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /yang shin tu yun ring por 'khor zhing 'phyan 'phyan nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / rim gro byas nas shes rab kyi pha
267a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems
267a2('bum): dpa' yang dang yang du dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bar ma gyur la/ lus thob pa des sems bskyed pa snga ma dag myi smod myi 'chags na/ de ni sa gnyis su
267a3('bum): 'gro bar rig par bya ste/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong nyan thos kyi theg pa pas ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi las ltung ba gang
267a4('bum): yang rung ba gcig byas na/ dge sbyong ma yin shAg kya'i bu ma yin par 'gyur te/ de ni lus de nyid kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las dge sbyong gi 'bras bu gang yang rung ba la la
267a5('bum): 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mying bstan pa tsam gyis rlom sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed cing mying
267a6('bum): tsam brjod pa des byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang / 'phya ba dang khyad du gsod pa'i sems skyed pa de ni de bas kyang shin tu lci ba ste/ sems bskyed pa de ni
267a7('bum): de bas kyang shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de lta mying bstan pas bdud kyi las shin tu phra ba de lta bu dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor ltung ba'i rtsa ba lci ba bzhi po lta
267a8('bum): zhog gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i mying bstan pa tsam gyis rlom sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa de ni mtshams myed pa lnga bas kyang shin tu lci ba ste/ sems bskyed
267b1('bum): pa de ni des de bas kyang shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dben pa'i yon tan ston cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs te/ 'di
267b2('bum): skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni dben pa'i yon tan gsung pa'o zer te/ rab 'byor ngas ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa 'am/ nags 'dab
267b3('bum): 'am/ bas mtha'i gnas dben par ma bshad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dgon pa dang / nags 'dab dang / bas mtha'i gnas dben pa ma lags na/
267b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa gzhan ni gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa gzhan ni ji lta bu zhig
267b5('bum): mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
267b6('bum): dben na/ dgon pa dang / nags 'dab dang / bas mtha'i gnas na rnam par spyod na/ rab 'byor 'di ni dben pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ngas
267b7('bum): gnang ba'o/ /gal te dben pa 'dis nyin mtshan du rnam par spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i dben pas dben
267b8('bum): pa rnam par spyod pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon pa dang / nags 'dab dang / bas mtha'i gnas na rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
268a1('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang 'dres pa rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni myi dben par rnam par spyod pa yin no/ /gal te grong na spyod kyang nyan thos
268a2('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma 'dres na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dben par rnam par spyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
268a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams la dben pa'i rnam pa de lta bu ngas gnang ba las dris shing bdud sdig to can de la dgon pa dang / nags 'dab dang / bas mtha'i gnas su rnam par spyod cig
268a4('bum): ces dben pa ston te/ de dben pa des 'du 'dzir gyur pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang 'dres par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa
268a5('bum): ma yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /de de ltar rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod cing yid la bya ba yongs su ma dag pas/ byang chub
268a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grong mdab na rnam par spyod cing yid la bya ba yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ nyan thos kyi sems dang ma 'dris pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
268a7('bum): dang ma 'dres pa/ de ma yin pa sdig pa'i sems gzhan dang ma 'dres pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes
268a8('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed de/ thabs myi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bas dgon pa sprul dang ri dgas dang / bya yod pa rkun po dang / sme
268b1('bum): sha can yod pa/ gcan zan mche ba can dang / srin po rgyu ba dpag tshad brgya tsam du 'phags pa de lta bu'i nang na 'dug cing / lo gcig gam/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong
268b2('bum): ngam/ lo bye ba 'am/ lo bye ba phrag brgya 'am/ lo bye ba phrag stong ngam/ lo bye ba brgya phrag stong ngam/ lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong ngam/ de bas kyang lhag par gnas su zin kyang dben pa gang
268b3('bum): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par gnas shing rnam par spyod pa de lta bu'i dben pa shes par myi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
268b4('bum): dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang po dang ma 'dres pa nyid du rnam par spyod par 'gyur te/ dben pa de la yang dag par gtses par gnas shing chags pa
268b5('bum): dang zhen cing mngon par zhen pa de tsam gyis ni nga'i sems rangs par myi 'gyur te/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la dben pa gang bshad pa'i dben pa de dang myi ldan par
268b6('bum): dben pa de la myi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dben pa de dang bral ba'i phyir te/ de ltar de'i drung du bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ongs shing / steng gi bar
268b7('bum): snang na gnas te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i dben pa ma nor ba yin gyis khyod dben pa 'di nyid
268b8('bum): kyis ni rnam par spyod cig / des khyod myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes zer te/ de'i rgyus de dben
269a1('bum): pa de bas kyang dben par gces par 'dzin cing / phyir grong mdab du 'ongs nas/ dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sems dang yid la bya ba yongs su dag pa/ des dge ba'i chos
269a2('bum): dang ldan pa/ gzhan dag la tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni 'du 'dzi'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyod do zhes khyad du gsod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben bar spyod pa de dag la 'du 'dzis rnam
269a3('bum): par spyod par skyon du gdags pa dang / 'dres par rnam par spyod pas skyon du gdags pas brnyas pa'i sems skyed do/ /gang 'du 'dzi'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyod pa de dag la ni dben par rnam par spyod pas 'dzin cing / de dag la rim gror skyed do/ /gang la rim 'gro bskyed par bya ba de dag ni nga rgyal skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag myi ma yin pas bskul ba'o/ /myi ma yin
269a4('bum): bas dran par bya'o/ /rnam par spyod pa gang gis bdag sbyong ba de'i rnam par spyod pa ma nor ba ste/ grong mdab na spyod pa la lta la su zhig bskul bar 'gyur/ grong mdab na spyod pa lta la su zhig dran bar 'gyur zhes nga rgyal skyed de/
269a5('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gzhan dag la smod par byed de/ rab 'byor gang zag de ni byang chub sems dpa' gdol par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub
269a6('bum): sems dpa' sun 'byin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan du rig par bya'o/ /de ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rkun po ste/ de ni lha dang myi dang lha
269a7('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dge sbyong gi cha byad kyi rkun por rig par bya ste/ ngang tshul de lta bu dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
269a8('bum): dag gis bsnyen par myi bya/ bsten par myi bya/ rim gror myi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang zag de lta bu dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
269b1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma btang la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yongs su ma btang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269b2('bum): chen po bsam pa thag pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar 'dod pa des/ gang zag de lta bu'i ngang
269b3('bum): tshul can bsnyen par myi bya/ bsten par myi bya/ rim gror myi bya'i/ rang gi don dang ldan par 'gyur ba la brtson bar bya ste/ 'khor ba las rtag tu skyo zhing 'jigs pa'i yid kyis khams gsum dang ma
269b4('bum): 'dres par spyad par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa de la yang byams pa skyed par bya ste/ de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir snying rje bskyed par bya'o/ /dga' ba dang gtang snyoms bskyed par
269b5('bum): bya'o/ /des sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ ci nas kyang bdag gi nyes pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad myed cing myi skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /gal te skyes na yang myur du spang bar
269b6('bum): bya'o zhes bslab par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rang gis khong du chud pa'i mngon par shes pa'i mthur rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
269b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag
269b8('bum): la bsnyen pa bya'o/ /bsten par bya'o/ /rim gror bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bgyi ba de dag gang
270a1('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
270a2('bum): du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor nyan
270a3('bum): thos gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug rjod cing ston pa dang / 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
270a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
270a5('bum): rig par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa'
270a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /
270a7('bum): dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
270a8('bum): rig par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang
270b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes
270b2('bum): gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /tshad myed pa bzhi ni byang chub
270b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
270b4('bum): rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /
270b5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
270b6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /mngon par
270b7('bum): shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
270b8('bum): chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin
271a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
271a2('bum): kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
271a3('bum): bcwo brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings ni byang chub sems dpa'
271a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ pha rol
271a5('bum): tu phyin pa drug ni lam mo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o/ /shes rab bo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyen no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug
271a6('bum): ni skyabs so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni mgon no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ma'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pha'o/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ston par rig par bya ste/ stong pa nyid thams cad ni lam
271a7('bum): mo/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni snang ba'o/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni sgron ma'o/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni blo'o/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes pa'o/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes rab bo/ /stong pa
271a8('bum): nyid thams cad ni dpung gnyen no/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni skyabs so/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni mgon no/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni ma'o/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni pha'o/ /dran pa nye bar
271b1('bum): gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni lam mo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni snang ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar
271b2('bum): gzhag pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni skyabs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni mgon no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni
271b3('bum): ma'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni pha'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni lam
271b4('bum): mo/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni snang ba'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sgron ma'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni dpung gnyen no/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni skyabs so/ /yang dag par
271b5('bum): spong ba bzhi ni mgon no/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni ma'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni pha'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par
271b6('bum): rig par bya ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni lam mo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni snang ba'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
271b7('bum): pa bzhi ni skyabs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni mgon no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni ma'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni pha'o/ /dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
271b8('bum): rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ dbang po lnga ni lam mo/ /dbang po lnga ni snang ba'o/ /dbang po lnga ni sgron ma'o/ /dbang po lnga ni dpung gnyen no/ /dbang po lnga ni skyabs so/ /dbang po lnga ni mgon no/ /
272a1('bum): dbang po lnga ni ma'o/ /dbang po lnga ni pha'o/ /stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ stobs lnga ni lam mo/ /stobs lnga ni snang ba'o/ /
272a2('bum): stobs lnga ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /stobs lnga ni dpung gnyen no/ stobs lnga ni skyabs so/ /stobs lnga ni mgon no/ /stobs lnga ni ma'o/ /stobs lnga ni pha'o/ /byang chub kyi
272a3('bum): yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni lam mo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni snang ba'o/ /byang chub
272a4('bum): kyi yan lag bdun ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni dpung gnyen no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni skyabs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni
272a5('bum): mgon no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni ma'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni pha'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par
272a6('bum): rig par bya ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni lam mo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snang ba'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes
272a7('bum): pa'o shes rab bo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dpung gnyen no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni skyabs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mgon no/ /'phags
272a8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni pha'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcwo brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i
272b1('bum): bden pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni lam mo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni snang ba'o/ /'phags
272b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni skyabs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
272b3('bum): ni mgon no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni pha'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya
272b4('bum): ste/ bsam gtan rnams ni lam mo/ /bsam gtan rnams ni snang ba'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /bsam gtan rnams ni dpung gnyen no/ /bsam gtan rnams ni skyabs so/ /bsam
272b5('bum): gtan rnams ni mgon no/ /bsam gtan rnams ni ma'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni pha'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/
272b6('bum): tshad myed pa rnams ni lam mo/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni snang ba'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no/ /tshad myed pa
272b7('bum): rnams ni skyabs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni mgon no/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni ma'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni pha'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'
272b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni lam mo/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snang ba'o/ /gzugs
273a1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
273a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni skyabs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mgon no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
273a3('bum): pa rnams ni pha'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni lam mo/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni snang ba'o/ /
273a4('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dpung gnyen no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni skyabs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni mgon no/ /
273a5('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ma'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni pha'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par
273a6('bum): rig par bya ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni lam mo/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni snang ba'o/ /mthar kyis gnas
273a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sgron ma'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dpung gnyen no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni skyabs so/ /
273a8('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mgon no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni pha'o/ /
273b1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
273b2('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni lam mo/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni snang ba'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
273b3('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni dpung
273b4('bum): gnyen no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni skyabs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
273b5('bum): pa ni mgon no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni ma'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
273b6('bum): pa myed pa ni pha'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni lam mo/ /mngon
273b7('bum): par shes pa rnams ni snang ba'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no/ /mngon par
273b8('bum): shes pa rnams ni skyabs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni mgon no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni pha'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni
274a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni lam mo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snang ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin
274a2('bum): rnams ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dpung gnyen no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni skyabs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mgon no/ /ting nge
274a3('bum): 'dzin rnams ni ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni pha'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ gzungs kyi
274a4('bum): sgo rnams ni lam mo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snang ba'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dpung gnyen no/ /
274a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni skyabs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mgon no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni pha'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
274a6('bum): bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni lam mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
274a7('bum): ni snang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dpung gnyen no/ /de bzhin
274a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni skyabs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni mgon no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
274b1('bum): bcu ni pha'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni snang ba'o/ /
274b2('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni skyabs so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni mgon
274b3('bum): no/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni pha'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya
274b4('bum): ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni lam mo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni snang ba'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab
274b5('bum): bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni skyabs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni mgon no/ /so so yang dag
274b6('bum): par rig pa bzhi ni ma'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni pha'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston
274b7('bum): par rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni lam mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni snang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
274b8('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni dpung gnyen no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni
275a1('bum): skyabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni mgon no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni ma'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni
275a2('bum): pha'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam mo/ /lam gyi rnam
275a3('bum): pa shes pa nyid ni snang ba'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o/ /blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dpung gnyen no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes
275a4('bum): pa nyid ni skyabs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pha'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
275a5('bum): pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni 'das
275a6('bum): pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to/ /rab
275a7('bum): ' byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i
275a8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
275b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di
275b2('bum): las byung ba'i 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par
275b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar 'dod pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
275b4('bum): sems can rnams bsdu bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa ste/ rab 'byor ngas don kyi dbang de
275b5('bum): mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang / pha dang ma dang dpung
275b6('bum): gnyen dang skyabs dang mgon yin no zhes brjod do/ /rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog par bya bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring myi
275b7('bum): 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can
275b8('bum): yongs su smyin par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
276a1('bum): chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las rgya cher bstan to/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
276a2('bum): tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
276a3('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid myed pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang myed do/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang
276a4('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
276a5('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
276a6('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni chos thams kyis stong pa'o/ /rab
276a7('bum): 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad yod
276a8('bum): do/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong na/
276b1('bum): sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur/ rnam par byang
276b2('bum): bar myi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar myi 'gyur/ dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
276b3('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya/ dben pas ni chos thams cad gang yang myi dmyigs/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu
276b4('bum): myi dmyigs na/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems
276b5('bum): can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba la spyod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de de ltar lags te/ sems can
276b6('bum): rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya ba
276b7('bum): dben zhing stong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben no/ /bde bar gshegs pa stong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
276b8('bum): 'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cig kun tu 'khor bar gyur tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de de lta
277a1('bum): lags te/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
277a2('bum): de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa yin te/ gang la bdag tu bya ba myed pa dang / bdag gir bya ba myed pa de la 'dzin pa myed/ gang la 'dzin pa myed pa de la sems
277a3('bum): can kun tu rgyug cing kun 'khor ba myed de/ de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang myed pa ni/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no/ /gsol pa/
277a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs la myi spyod/ tshor ba la myi spyod/ 'du shes la myi spyod/ 'du byed la myi spyod/
277a5('bum): rnam par shes pa la myi spyod do/ /myig la myi spyod/ rna ba la myi spyod/ sna la myi spyod/ lce la myi spyod/ lus la myi spyod/ yid la myi spyod/ gzugs la myi spyod/
277a6('bum): sgra la myi spyod/ dri la myi spyod/ ro la myi spyod/ reg la myi spyod/ chos la myi spyod do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi
277a7('bum): spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod do/ /myig gi
277a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ yid
277b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
277b2('bum): ba la myi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi spyod
277b3('bum): do/ /sa'i khams la myi spyod/ chu'i khams la myi spyod/ mye'i khams la myi spyod/ rlung gi khams la myi spyod/ nam mkha'i khams la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i
277b4('bum): khams la myi spyod do/ /ma rig pa la myi spyod/ 'du byed la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ mying dang gzugs la myi spyod/ skye mched drug la myi spyod/ reg pa la
277b5('bum): myi spyod/ tshor ba la myi spyod/ sred pa la myi spyod/ len pa la myi spyod/ srid pa la myi spyod/ skye ba la myi spyod/ rga shi la myi spyod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod/
277b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi
277b7('bum): spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la myi spyod/
277b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ dor ba
278a1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
278a2('bum): la myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi spyod/ yang
278a3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams la myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myi spyod/ dbang po rnams la myi spyod/ stobs rnams la myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myi spyod/ 'phags
278a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams la myi spyod/ tshad myed pa rnams la myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
278a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
278a6('bum): smon pa myed pa la myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi spyod/

278b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil kyis gnon par myi nus so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i

283a4('bum): ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/ de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo/ /de dag rnam par spyod pa des/ rnam par spyod pas dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/ de dag
283a5('bum): dga' ba chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /de dag mtshan ma de dag lhan cig myi gnas te/ de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
283a6('bum): kyis shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /
283a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
283a8('bum): pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang / sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog go/ /de dag shes rab kyi
283b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ su'i gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang /
283b2('bum): sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms
283b3('bum): la yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen po 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi brtson ra na gnas pa'i sems
283b4('bum): can rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bla na myed pa'i shes rab kyi myig bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
283b5('bum): bas rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par gnas par bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par myi spyod na yang / des
283b6('bum): yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs myi dbye ste/ des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan du myi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o/ /rab 'byor
283b7('bum): 'di lta ste dper na sngon cad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par 'gyur te/ des nor bu rin po che de rnyed par dga' ba dang /
283b8('bum): spro ba dang / yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/ des nor bu rin po che de/ rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/ de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang /
284a1('bum): yid myi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i
284a2('bum): yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun tu 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsam te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
284a3('bum): yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de gtor bar yang myi bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
284a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems
284a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba lags/ bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' myi dmyigs/ yid la bgyi ba myi dmyigs/
284a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang
284a7('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas
284a8('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya bar
284b1('bum): shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis
284b2('bum): dben/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de la 'phel ba myed do/ /yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing rang bzhin
284b3('bum): gyis stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
284b4('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
284b5('bum): par byung yang 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa myed de/ de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'
284b6('bum): la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin gnyis kyang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'
284b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'jum myi 'god/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
284b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/
285a1('bum): rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa gang
285a2('bum): lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
285a3('bum): gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmyigs su mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci
285a4('bum): lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
285a5('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid las gud du stong pa nyid spyod dam/ bcom ldan
285a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba shes rab
285a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
285a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/

286a1('bum): par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom

286a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i 'dus te
286a8('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/

289a4('bum): dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus
289a5('bum): pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
289a6('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du shes stong pa nyid dang /
289a7('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos

289b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /

300a6('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /

300a8('bum): stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang /
300b1('bum): rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid
300b2('bum): dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yang dag par spong ba
300b3('bum): bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
300b4('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
300b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
300b6('bum): ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis
300b7('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /
300b8('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos
301a1('bum): skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stobs lnga'i stong
301a2('bum): pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /

301a4('bum): ci lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /

301a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /

301b5('bum): pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshad myed pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying
301b6('bum): po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon
301b7('bum): myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
301b8('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
302a1('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings
302a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar
302a3('bum): pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin

302a5('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma
302a6('bum): mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa

302a8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin

302b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis

302b6('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
302b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan

303a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po
303a2('bum): ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang /

303a5('bum): gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ so so yang
303a6('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
303a7('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi
303a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de
303b1('bum): bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
303b2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /
