303b5('bum): nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
303b6('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
303b7('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
303b8('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha
304a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis
304a2('bum): pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
304a3('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid
304a4('bum): dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
304a5('bum): dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi
304a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
304a7('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
304a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin
304b1('bum): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i
304b2('bum): dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang /
304b3('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed
304b4('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong
304b5('bum): pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
304b6('bum): dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
304b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na/ bcom ldan
304b8('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
305a1('bum): chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
305a2('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /
305a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmyigs su yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /
305a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang dmyigs su myed pa de skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /
305a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa ste/ rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i
305a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ rab 'byor de ni stobs bcu dang / myi
305a7('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod de ltar rtsol
305a8('bum): de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par myi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas myed do/ /
305b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
305b2('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par myi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams cad kyi myi skye ba nyid gang
305b3('bum): lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
305b4('bum): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba yang ma lags/ myi skye ba yang ma lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang
305b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te skye ba yang ma lags/
305b6('bum): myi skye ba yang ma lags pa las kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung myi bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b7('bum): dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na myed pa yang dag
305b8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos gang
306a1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das 'das chos gang mngon par
306a2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
306a3('bum): ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam
306a4('bum): du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so/ /de ci'i
306a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad myed pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir
306a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par myi rtog pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu drug go// // de nas lha'i dbang po
306a7('bum): brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu
306a8('bum): dben pa'i slad du blta dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben
306b1('bum): pa'i slad du rtag tu ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
306b2('bum): pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sems
306b3('bum): can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
306b4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
306b5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
306b6('bum): de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa de dag ni
306b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/ bsam
306b8('bum): gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur la/ rigs kyi
307a1('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par 'gyur te/ bzung zhing bcangs/ blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de
307a2('bum): bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ ke'u shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang
307a3('bum): nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang
307a4('bum): nye bar myi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang myi bzod do/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can
307a5('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa
307a6('bum): de dag thams cad ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed
307a7('bum): pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na myed par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las
307a8('bum): byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa de dag gi zil gyis non to/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling gi
307b1('bum): sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan
307b2('bum): pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil kyis non na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
307b3('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin
307b4('bum): nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis gnon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni lha dang myi dang lha ma
307b5('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'gro
307b6('bum): bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag
307b7('bum): thams cad zil kyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/ byang chub
307b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
308a1('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil kyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'
308a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil kyis gnon cing 'gro
308a3('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha
308a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
308a5('bum): la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa
308a6('bum): dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/
308a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab
308a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
308b1('bum): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan par myi nus so/ /byang chub sems
308b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa dang 'thun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
308b3('bum): po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun myi 'chad pa'i don du gnas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyang ring du myi byed pa'o/ /de ltar
308b4('bum): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub la 'phang bar myi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can bying ba rnams
308b5('bum): 'don par 'dod pa'o/ /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/ /rang
308b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/ /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te nye bar dong zhing 'di
308b7('bum): skad ces smras so/ /kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig /skyes bu chen po skyen par slobs shig /lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/ bla na myed pa
308b8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas blang bar bya ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
309a1('bum): kyis bzhes pa'o zer zhing ston to/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang
309a2('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dong bar sems so/ /de'i drung du bdag kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i rgyal po rab
309a3('bum): mtshe ma yang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i rgyal po
309a4('bum): rab 'phrul dga' yang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /tshangs pa myi
309a5('bum): mjed kyi bdag po yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong
309a6('bum): bar sems so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /myi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /
309a7('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /
309a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub
309b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la
309b2('bum): 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la myi 'byung myi 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur
309b3('bum): ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ myig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang
309b4('bum): lus la myi 'byung myi 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o/ /de nas
309b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa
309b6('bum): brjod cing / 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas
309b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod
309b8('bum): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i dbang
310a1('bum): po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang / legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
310a2('bum): byin gyis brlabs so/ /dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang /
310a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di
310a4('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub
310a5('bum): thob par 'gyur ram 'on te ma yin gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang gang
310a6('bum): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems
310a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las
310a8('bum): sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar mda' ltung bar gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan
310b1('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/
310b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no/ /dga' bos gsol pa/
310b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
310b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo / /dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/
310b5('bum): 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo / /dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i
310b6('bum): bshes gnyen dang bral na/ des dge ba'i gshes gnyen mi mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi thos so/ /ma thos pas myi shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa
310b7('bum): ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan myi byed do/ /dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
310b8('bum): pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi
311a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa rjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni
311a2('bum): bdag gi grogs yin te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/ bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems
311a3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni/ de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ dga' bo byang chub sems
311a4('bum): dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyi glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
311a5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang bzung ba dang / blags pa
311a6('bum): dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/ khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /
311a7('bum): dga' bo gzhan yang gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa skyed cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ /nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
311a8('bum): pa la spyad pa'o/ /nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ /nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ /nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ /nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
311b1('bum): phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ /khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni brtson
311b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rloms sems su byed na/
311b3('bum): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rloms sems skyed na/ dga' bo de'i tshe
311b4('bum): bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur
311b5('bum): ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i mying brjod pa 'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/ de mying brjod pa 'am rus brjod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
311b6('bum): chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag bstod gzhan smod la/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de
311b7('bum): dag kyang de la myed par rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing bdag bstod gzhan smod de/ 'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems
311b8('bum): dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par myi snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par myi snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
312a1('bum): pa pa de dag la myi snyan par brjod cing smod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs par myi 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas
312a2('bum): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yid dgas kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig bzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin kyis
312a3('bum): rlob ste/ de'i tshig bzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par bya bar sems te/ de la de dag gis thos sam mthong na/ 'thun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong
312a4('bum): nas 'thun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/ de dag de bzhin du slob pa'i tshe de bzhin nyid du slob cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci
312a5('bum): log du gyur pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad myi 'dod pa dang / myi sdug pa dang yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu
312a6('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo don kyi dbang de mthong
312a7('bum): nas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing nga ni
312a8('bum): mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/ khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
312b1('bum): nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thab mo dang 'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dang mtshang 'dru bar 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo/ /de ni byol song gi
312b2('bum): skye gnas kyi lam mo/ /de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo/ /de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
312b3('bum): dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la/ 'khrug cing mtshangs 'dru na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du
312b4('bum): byed pa'o/ /'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam pa thams
312b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde
312b6('bum): ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing / 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dru na/ gal te
312b7('bum): des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su myi btang zhe na/ ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'khrug cig 'tshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal par go ca bgo bar
312b8('bum): bya'o/ /dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam 'on te ma lags kyis bskal pa de snyed kho nar go ca bgo 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das
313a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang
313a2('bum): bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang / 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing myi snyan du brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang /
313a3('bum): myi snyan par rjod pa byas nas/ phyir myi chags par mdung bar 'dzin cing khon tu gzung ste gnas na/ dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga myi smra ste/ gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
313a4('bum): pa nyid yongs su myi gtang zhe na/ gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go ca bgo bar bya'o/ /dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang myi snyan par brjod
313a5('bum): par gyur na yang / mdud par myi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing / bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bstsal dgos na/ de ltar
313a6('bum): bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/ de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing / phyir zlogs pa ni myi tshul gyis/ bdag gis de ltar myi bya'i/
313a7('bum): bdag gis glen pa dang / lkug pa bzhin du bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa myed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
313a8('bum): sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis
313b1('bum): bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su myi bya'o/ /bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par myi bya'o snyam na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad do/ /de la ni
313b2('bum): bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags myi rnyed do/ /dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par myi bya'o/ /
313b3('bum): de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o/ /'dug par myi bya'o/ /gal te 'dug na yang des su la yang gnod sems su myi bya 'khrug par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod
313b4('bum): s ems su
314a1('bum): bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la myi tshul lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
314a2('bum): rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
314a3('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/ byang chub
314a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o/ /'dis ji ltar
314a5('bum): bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o/ /'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
314a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
314a7('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
314a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
314b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
314b2('bum): bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
314b3('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis
314b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
314b5('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
314b6('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang
314b7('bum): la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed do/ /des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par byas te/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs
314b8('bum): par byang chub kyi ston pa ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis bslab par
315a1('bum): myi bya'i/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / ma bral bar gnas na/
315a2('bum): bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no/ /
315a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu bdun no// //legs so legs so// //
